Summary: I stayed here for one night while visiting town. The location was convenient to Angel Stadium, for those interested there, easy walking distance. It was also a quick drive to the hospital/clinic I needed to visit. For the price, this was a nice option. The room was spacious and worked fine for my needs. The bathroom felt a little dated but worked; its location, at least in the room I was in, was a little strange, off of the main area instead of the separate bedroom. Probably a good arrangement if you have kids/others on the sofa bed, I would have been happier with it in the bedroom. But it worked fine. The hot water and water pressure were great, which is always appreciated, and the breakfast (included as part of the rate) had both hot and cold options and felt pretty standard
Manager Response: Dear SnowyShasta,       Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We were very happy to serve as your home away from home during your travels to Anaheim! We are delighted that our hotel is in a prime location and conveniently located near Angels Stadium, and within walking distance to a plethora of shops and restaurants. It was a pleasure serving you, and we hope to see you again during your future travels to the area!   Cheers, Rahshae S.

Summary Heading: Bring your own TP and don’t expect friendly service
Summary: Stayed here for one night while in Orange County. The location is excellent, close to Anaheim Stadium and all of the major freeways. The rooms are average, you can definitely tell it’s outdated but they were clean, quiet rooms. Check in service was terrible; you could tell the girl working the desk was miserable and it reflected in her service. I politely asked if there were any room upgrades available since I’m a titanium member and after much huffing and puffing by the girl she responded “well I guess since you’re only here for one night and I can honor that since you are a elite member.” Wow thanks for doing me a favor when your hotel parking lot is practically empty. The worst part is around 9:30pm we ran out of TP. They gave us less than a quarter roll and left us no
Manager Response: Dear mtakehara,        Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am very sorry to hear that you did not have a positive experience. I will be sure to share your comments with our Guest Services team about the lack of customer service you received during your stay. Please know that we always aspire to deliver an exceptional guest experience and we fell short of that this time. We will work diligently to address and correct these issues and hope to earn another opportunity to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,

Summary: 40 years out of date. Decore, rugs, pillows, bed. Sofa bed 1  inch at most, with tears and a  flimsy threadbare "protector". Felt horrible my son had to sleep on it. 1960 doors, walls. And we stayed in the "2 bedroom" suite. Toilet and shower together and only 1 for space. Bathroom in lobby is out of service and you had to go to your room if you used lobby or exercise room. Nope - not worth the expense.
Room tip: Avoid unless you have to have convience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, danah810.  We were disappointed to learn that the condition of our hotel did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: After reading the previous reviews, I was skeptical about my reservation, BUT I was pleasantly surprised!  The hotel is super clean.  The furniture is a little dated BUT clean.  I didn't have my room cleaned, everyday (my request), but the Front Desk did give me fresh towels on request.  The  complementary breakfasts were YUMMY!  The breakfast items were displayed, very eye appealingly, and staff kept the hot items filled.  The Lady manager, was very helpful, as we were from Pittsburgh-spending 7 days at the Town Plaza Suites.  We were there to attend the Kim Hyun Joong concert, at the City National, which was 4 minutes from the hotel.  We didn't use the pool-just not enough time.  The rooms were well insulated as we couldn't hear noise from the surrounding rooms/hall, and the
Room tip: Don't let others's negativity sway you, from a good deal!
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, 62ruthannc!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay at TownePlace Suites Anaheim so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our clean rooms and friendly staff, but also our delicious breakfast and perfect soundproofing! Your praise lets us know we're doing our job!  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience!

Summary: This is a poor excuse for a hotel. Worn out. Needs most of the items in the room either thrown away or remodeled. This hotel was built and left to die. Tub stained, shower curtain ripped, shower rod loose, cove basing coming unglued, chrome on faucet totally gone...not even chrome any more. Stove hood rusting, stove rusting...when I got food from the store on the way to the motel, I was afraid to cook....utensils and cookware in deplorable condition. Pool in such poor repair that instead of replastering, they appear to have just painted over the holes in the plaster. This has made a great place for algae to root and the pool now has black algae. Lighting in room difficult...light fixture on ceiling had no lights and was stained around it. Countertop microwave screwed to cabinets
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback.  It's unfortunate your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We regret you weren't entirely satisfied with our furnishings and accommodations, and felt your room was was worn. We have brought your concerns to our housekeeping team to ensure all rooms are being refreshed properly prior to guest check in. We also are disappointed that you were not satisfied with our pool, we will be sure to confirm that it is being cleaned properly and on schedule.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary: The good... Staff was very attentive and polite at check in and with any complaints. Breakfast was better than many other Marriotts that I have stayed at. Hotel upgraded my one bedroom suite to a two bedroom suite. We stayed here because the points or price to book is cheaper than the hotels closer to Disneyland but also mainly the fact that you don't have to pay to park a car and they offer free breakfast which is not offered at most properties close to Disneyland.   The Bad... I don't usually look at reviews at any of my Marriott properties when I book. I am a gold elite member and travel often and always find the rooms cleaned and up to date on refurbishments. Marriott properties are always clean and have comfortable beds, pillows and furniture. This hotel needs a full
Room tip: Uber cost $9 to disneyland from this hotel. Breakfast  scrambled eggs, brfst sandwich, toast,...
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel, Tami.  We are pleased to hear that you had a positive experience with our front desk team at check in, and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. However we are sorry to hear that you were not completely satisfied with your experience and that you felt the property was in need of a full remodel. We appreciate your feedback and will be sure to share it with our house keeping team in order to make improvements. We hope that you will give us another chance to provide you with a better experience in the future.

Summary: Was looking for a hotel within walking distance of Angel stadium for a game on the weekend.  This really is the ONLY choice unless you want to hail an Uber after the game. Location is great - next to food as well as the stadium  Interior is a bit dated and a little rough on the edges. Small holes in the furniture and lamp shades. Nothing horrible though.   Had a nice surprise with the room - didn't realize it also had a kitchenette in it. Made me wish we were staying more than one night!  One issue we did have was with the bed. It was super soft and saggy - the both of us kept rolling into each other while trying to sleep. The sag in the middle was seriously bad. (room 224.) Woke up kind of achy from the mattress.   Walls are paper thin here too. Thankfully, our neighbors went
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4/5 rating, Michele!  We're happy you had a pleasant stay with us and appreciated our convenient location. It's unfortunate you had such challenges with our condition of accommodations and bedding. We're disappointed we couldn't accommodate your needs and fix the problem. We hold ourselves to a higher standard. We'll address your concern with our team moving forward.  We strive for excellence so we look forward to sharing an even better experience with you soon! Have a lovely day.

Summary Heading: Decent stay... with a few blemishes.
Summary: I like to stay in these extended-stay/apartment-style places whenever I'm on business, since there is a bit more space to spread out and it usually comes with a kitchenette or full-sized kitchen (helps avoid eating out).   Considering the area, this was a good location with preferential pricing through work. Yes, while it's close to the Anaheim Resort area - particularly, Disneyland and Angel Stadium - it is also minutes from the UCI Medical Center in Orange (10 minutes away). Great spot if you're interviewing for Residency/Fellowship or some other role at the hospital.   I had a 4th floor Studio Suite overlooking the parking lot in the Main building. This is preferred. You don't want a room on the side facing State College Blvd, since it'll definitely be noisier. Any rooms
Room tip: Rooms facing parking lot on Main or Second Building are quietest.
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review, Eterion!  It's wonderful you enjoyed your stay at TownePlace Suites Anaheim so much! We strive for excellence so we're thrilled you appreciated not only our convenient location, soundproofing, secure atmosphere and available amenities, but also our friendly staff! Joy is a treasured member of our team and your praise lets us know we're doing our job! Your feedback regarding the condition of our property as well as the cleanliness of our rooms and wasp nest outside are helpful and will be communicated to our management team moving forward.  We can't wait to host you again soon for another amazing experience!

Summary Heading: Nice employees  -  Desperately in need of a complete remodel & refurbishment!
Summary: We stayed for a total of 7 nights in Aug, 2022 - the employees were helpful & attentive, the breakfast was good (they served Jimmy Dean's Breakfast Sandwiches). But the rooms, decor and public spaces were tired, dingy & frayed. It's really not worthy of having the Marriott name in it. The whole facility is in need of a serious gutting and remodeling, including replacing carpeting and furniture. Our average per night cost was $230.00. There is no daily housekeeping.
Room tip: Do not stay here till the remodel
Manager Response: We appreciate that you took the time to share your feedback, Eva.  We're disappointed that your stay in our hotel didn't exceed your expectations. We also regret that you weren't entirely satisfied with the quality and condition of our furnishings and accommodations. We care about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with the appropriate members of our team so that we may improve moving forward.  We hope for the opportunity to host you again soon for a more positive experience.

Summary: I can’t believe that a single night at this awful hotel room cost me over $300. Everything in it feels old and poor quality. The room and hallways of the building smell musty at best. Mold on the ceiling of the shower. Small lousy televisions. Furniture that looks like it was found on the side of the road. Frayed dirty carpet. Honestly was embarrassed when we got into the room that this is what I booked for a night at the Angels game with my family. The pool was nice to have but not worth it to hear co olaints from everyone you’re with every time you enter the room and hallway. This place is just low budget all around for the price of a nice quality room. I’ve never been to a Marriott that left me so disgusted.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We were disappointed to learn that the condition of our hotel did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Stay at any other hotel! Any other!!!
Summary: Google review summary 3.8 Good 757 reviews Rooms 2.2 Location 4.6 Service 3.9 What guests are saying 	"Staff responded quickly to wipe down and vacum." 	"Room was a good price, but fairly dated decor and smelled like dog." 	"Well-priced for its quality, amenities, and location." More  Families 3.6  TownePlace Suites by Marriott Anaheim Maingate Near Angel Stadium 3.7/5 · 2,966 reviews  Priceline 8.4/10 · 117 reviews Reviews Search reviews People often mention  Heather May 1/5 a minute ago on  Google Check in was a nightmare. We were sure we had booked a room with 2 queen beds and were told well the room has a bed and a fold out couch- technically that's 2 beds. That's not what we were expecting- can we cancel - yes but we have to charge you for a night- the gall told us there
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback, L4804OQheatherm.  We're disheartened that your time with us was less than ideal. We regret that our property as a whole failed to meet your expectations. We will be sure to alert the appropriate members of our team to rectify these issues. We care deeply about our guests and want to provide the best service possible. Thank you for bringing these concerns to our attention.  We hope you give us another chance to host you soon so we can share a more positive experience.

Summary: I travel to various brands throughout the U.S. I have Platinum status. This hotel is the bare minimum for the lowest of Marriott brands. Travelled this time with my family of 6. Room is terribly dated and just all around dirty. Needs new carpets (feet are black after walking on it). Black mold on bathroom ceiling. Beds are dated and SUPER uncomfortable. Pull out mattress has urine stains. Electrical outlets that cause the side table light to flicker and lose power intermittently.   The ONLY reason this gets the 3.8 on their ratings is because of location/proximity to  Angels stadium (walking) and Disneyland (short drive). If you don’t mind being charged for a MUCH higher quality hotel and living in filth, this place is for you! Next time we will stay farther from our destination
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us.  We're disappointed that your experience with us was anything less than ideal. It's also unfortunate you've noticed a decline in the quality and condition of our accommodations. We care about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so we'll address all of your concerns with the appropriate members of our team so that we may improve moving forward.  We hope to see you again soon so we can share a more positive experience that our guests are accustomed to.

Summary Heading: Second time staying, still has its charm
Summary: The experience was consistent with my first time: The room clean, though dated. Aircons were functional, though noisy. The bed was a bit too soft for my liking, but each to his own.   The front desk was friendly and helpful. For the price, this hotel does the job.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your 4/5 review with us.  We're thrilled to hear you had such an enjoyable experience with us. We care about the comfort and satisfaction of our guests so we appreciate you letting us know what we can do to make your stay perfect. We'll make sure to communicate your feedback to the appropriate members of our team so that we may improve moving forward.  We're looking forward to sharing a more enjoyable experience with you soon. Thank you again!

Summary: The place is very conveniently located near Angel Stadium (easy 10-minute walk), Disneyland, and Knotts Berry Farm (if driving). It is also a short drive to Disneyland, but while public transportation is available, it is a bit confusing and hard to figure out just how to catch a shuttle/bus to Disneyland.  There are several and a variety fast-food/family restaurants just across the street in the Platinum Triangle and a few upper-scale restaurants across from the triangle.  The place is older as mentioned by several other reviewers, but our room was clean, well-stocked, and everything worked. Maybe the only issue was the TV that kept pixelating quite often and went blank for a bit and all day one time. But it wasn't such a big deal as we did not bother contacting the front desk.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great rating, K2686OKjamesy!  We are always working very hard to provide high-quality experiences for all of our guests. We're glad to know that you enjoyed our prime location and wonderful staff, but we are disappointed to hear that we could have done more for you. We will share your feedback with our team moving forward.  We look forward to sharing an even better experience with you soon! Have a beautiful day!

Summary Heading: Worst stay ever. Dirty. Loud. No service.
Summary: This poor place.  No doors locked, the carpet was ripped, dirty, stained. Walls and doors were filthy. There were even gloves hanging in the shower...guessing no one had cleaned there to even find them.   Our room wasn't in the main building and we checked in late and came to our room to find half the towels we needed/requested and a missing sheet. When we called to ask them (which I had to do from my cell because the room phone didn't work) they only had 1 person working and she couldn't leave the front desk.  The last night they stuck a full on party next door. Once my room started smelling like pot I called the front desk. They said they would call them. Lot of good that did considering that our phone didn't work and I am guessing theirs didn't either. Shoved a sheet under
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback.  We regret that your time with us was less than ideal as providing our guests with a pleasant experience is very important to us. It's very unfortunate our housekeeping services and room insulation as well as our customer service team didn't meet your expectations. We hold ourselves to a higher standard so we'll address your concerns with our team moving forward.  We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you soon.

Summary Heading: Disgusting dirty terrible smells like DEATH
Summary: This place is the WORST, I had the worst sleep ever I could not sleep at all. disgusting dirty flirty smells like death. Tv did not work, refrigerator  does not work . telephone did NOT work. I tried to air out the room with the air conditioner again another thing that does not work.Actually it made the room small worse. my advise do NOT stay here ever. the worst yuks. There was a large stain on the mattress and it smells like death. There was also homeless people camping in the parking lot I did not feel safe at all. imagine coming back from Disneyland after a great fun day and having to deal if we can make it back to our room safe.  if there was an option to give less than one star ,I would give them a ZERO rating . I have called customer service and filled a complaint I was
Manager Response: eahc2021  We appreciate you took the time to share about your stay at our hotel, we definitely can understand how frustrated you are based on your experience, and for that on behalf of the hotel we offer our most sincere apologies.  Our hotel definitely is not perfect and our staff is working hard to improve the overall guest experience everyday.  We will definitely look at our processes to see what improvements can be made, and we apologize that there were homeless people around our hotel, as well as the room condition issues you noted.  Please be safe!  Thank You

Summary Heading: Great Staff and location to Angels Stadium
Summary: When we visit Anaheim and go to LA Angels baseballs games, we like staying at this hotel as it is so near and such an easy 10 minute walk to Angel Stadium. The hotel is a little dated and not a resort type of hotel but is near to restaurants, Disneyland and other Anaheim attractions. The price of the room along with a kitchen makes for good value but the best thing is the staff led by Joy and Claudia. We visited during a busy weekend and although as a Platinum Elite Marriott Bonvoy member I could not get an early check-in. This was not due to them or the staff but in these COVID-19 times and like most businesses, they had limited staff to clean rooms, check in folks, etc. We like the location to Angel stadium and the many times we have stayed there, Joy and the team take care of
Manager Response: James C,  We sincerely appreciate your review, our hotel staff works very hard to provide an awesome experience for our guests, and Joy is definitely a leader at our hotel, she really sets the tone for other employees on providing great service.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future!  Please be safe!  Thank You

Summary: I got a good rate there. It's a mid range apartment, roomy enough for a family of 4. Quiet, as the surrounding streets are less travelled. Walking distance to some restaurants nearby, though some are closed temporarily due to Covid.   There is also a small pool, great for families.
Manager Response: Dionysus38,  We appreciate your response, and are delighted you enjoyed your stay, we hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future!  Please be safe!  Thank You

Summary: This hotel is definitely worn and dated. They have probably the smallest queen size beds I've ever slept in and not comfortable at all. The pool can barely be called a pool..... there is water in a hole in the ground. There is no lounge chairs at all. There was one round table with four chairs for the whole hotel. The entrance for loading and unloading luggage is miserable. One day there was no food except for muffins and Waffles even though it was supposed to include breakfast. It did have a reasonable size kitchenette so if you were a single person traveling for business it would probably be okay. We left and went across the street to the Holiday Inn Express as soon as we could get a room elsewhere.
Manager Response: kellythetraveler,  We are not certain you have the correct hotel, we do not have a Holiday Inn Express across the street, nor have we served waffles since early in 2020, we apologize for any inconvenience during your stay at our hotel, and we hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Please be safe!  Thank You

Summary: We were between houses for 7 weeks, and needed a long term place to stay.  This hotel was ideal for its location in Orange County.  Close (but not too close) to Freeway access.  Close to  some restaurants (even during COVID).  Security on the premises.  I felt safe there.  I didn't care much for the smell of marijuana - but I'm finding that to be part of the ambience everywhere now in big cities.  Joy and Kumi were extraordinary staff, who were extremely helpful with our stay.  Reserving the pool was awesome.  we asked for cleaning twice a week, which was convenient.  The laundry was basic, so we used an outside place.  The amenities were also basic, but we cooked meals there.  The beds were average comfort, including the pull out bed.  TV was fine.  Place was quiet at night,
Manager Response: amower99,  We are excited to have had the opportunity to serve you during your stay, we appreciate the time you took to write a review, as we take all feedback (good and bad) very seriously.  We appreciate your honest and fair assessment of our property, and the performance of our staff; we know that our hotel is not perfect and we are working every day to get one step closer in the right direction.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future!  Thank You

Summary: I evacuated with my senior parents and we were very pleased with our dtay. The suite was perfect for the three of us. We loved the full kitchen and the table that could be a desk or dining table. The service was the best part! I realized I had left my laptop charging cable and called the front desk. They found it and called me right back and worked out the best way for me to get it back.
Manager Response: W4420FZruthw  We hope you are staying safe, and that everything works out for you and your family, we're happy to help all of our guests, and certainly want to be there for guests during this difficult time (Covid-19 AND Fire evacuations!) We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future!  Again please be safe!  Thank You

Summary Heading: No Breakfast as advertised.  No Elite Recognition.  Very poor WiFi.
Summary: The title pretty much says it all.  There was no notification to guests during the reservation process that the hotel is not serving any kind of breakfast at this time, using Covid-19 as an excuse.  In fact, it's all over the confirmation page that one should look forward to the "hot breakfast".  That's fine if the hotel is going to adjust its prices but it did not.   There was also no Elite recognition at check-in.  The front desk clerk Ronak (?) gave no upgrade in a half-empty hotel and assigned rooms next to elevator and facing busy street instead.   Walls are very thin and poorly insulated.  You can hear your next door neighbor's conversation and even when they  flush their toilet!  Noises and footsteps from above you were also heavily transmitted, as well as their use of
Manager Response: We value all guest feedback positive and negative, and definitely all of the points you listed in your review can definitely be frustrating as a traveler.  Our hotel has temporarily suspended breakfast service and we will review our confirmations to ensure it is reflected on our brand site it does note that some hotel facilities or services may not be available during your stay; our hotel has seen a decrease in occupancy, and we have also cut down on staff, although the hotel may not be fully occupied all of our rooms may not have been serviced by our housekeeping staff which can sometimes effect put room availability even further.  We are hoping to be able to bring back more employees however this is an ongoing process.  We definitely appreciate our elite Bonvoy members, and we will definitely have our front desk staff coaching in order to ensure our guests feel properly welcomed.  We apologize your neighbors affected your stay and that you were placed close to an elevator, we will look to again provide training to our front desk staff to ensure we do our best to minimize these issues.  If you have any questions or concerns I would welcome an opportunity to connect with you.  On behalf of the entire staff at the Towneplace Suites Anaheim we hope you are safe and thank you for your loyalty.

Summary Heading: Friendly staff but hotel needs a good clean and update
Summary: The staff at this hotel are friendly and try to make you feel welcome however the hotel itself is a little dated and needs a good clean.    I stayed during the COVID outbreak where all services were suspended so there was no free breakfast, pool/gym closed and all housekeeping services stopped during stays, even when I had booked for 3 weeks.  Several other Marriott hotels around the country were still offering several of these services at either full or reduced level.  The kitchen was very basic and small, however it did have a full oven and 4-ring stovetop which is nice but no sharp knives for cutting. Odd numbers of plates and silverware were also provided, 4 forks but only 2 knives and 3 teaspoons for example.  Did find a cockroach in my room one day and there were some
Manager Response: Robflyfly,  We appreciate you taking the time to write about your stay at our hotel, we certainly value all feedback from our guests even negative ones as it provides us an opportunity to improve our property.  Thank you for mentioning the inconsistencies you noted in the room, we will definitely revisit to ensure the kitchen is fully stocked.  We currently utilize one of the nations leading pest control companies to service our hotel, your findings are very concerning and we will definitely have an investigation and some extra pest services scheduled.  Our pool will be opening on 7/3/2020 we definitely want to ensure our guests are able to enjoy our pool and will have social distancing measures in place in order to encourage everyone to be safe.  Housekeeping service is available for all guests we simply ask our guests to coordinate with the staff in order to ensure there is a safe time when the guest is not in the room for the safety of our employees.  We are also working on implementing a grab and go breakfast option for our guests as well, and hope to have it available soon.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Excellent customer service and great location!
Summary: My fiancé and I stayed for an extended period and had a very pleasant experience. The staff, especially Joy, Kumi, and Gene were always very welcoming and helpful. It definitely felt like a home away from home, especially during a difficult time. The amenities were a bit light due to Covid-19, but I appreciated the necessary precautions that they chose to take to keep people safe. The location is a short walk away from Angel's stadium and close to major freeways, so it was a great and convenient location! The decor may be a bit outdated, but the price is very fair for Orange County. I would definitely recommend TownePlace to my friends and family!
Manager Response: kjoykim,  We appreciate your loyalty, and are so happy you enjoyed your stay we hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future!  Thank You

Summary: There are lot of dissatisfied people who have left reviews. I think people aren’t realizing that while this hotel is in the Marriott chain, it is in the lower end of the Marriott brand. The hotel was more reasonably priced than most hotels in the area. It was easy to get an Uber ride to and from LAX and Disneyland. The room was sufficiently clean. The bedding was clean and comfortable. The room had a full fridge, range/oven, microwave and dishwasher. We didn’t use any of these appliances, but it was nice that they were available. Breakfast was the standard fare for hotel continental breakfasts. Breakfast wasn’t anything fancy, but sufficient to start the day. We enjoyed our 3 night stay and wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: scrappysquirrel,  Thank you for your review, we are so excited you enjoyed your experience while visiting our hotel.  We think you touched on all that our hotel has to offer, we hope you will choose to visit us again soon!  Thank You

Summary: We selected this location for its relative proximity to Disneyland. However rooms were worn and musty smelling. Carpets had stains. Lamps were hanging crooked off walls. Floors were slanted. Breakfast was mediocre and was never sufficient for the number of guests. This property needs an update and is not currently up to the standard of a Marriott-branded hotel under the Townplace Suites family.
Manager Response: DBWashington,  Thank you for your review, our hotel is definitely not perfect and we rely on our valued guests to provide critical feedback in order for our staff to improve.  We appreciate your honesty, and hope you will choose to visit us again soon.  Thank You

Summary: From the moment we stepped inside the lobby, we noticed the musky mildew smell. Friendly and efficient front desk staff. We enter the room and again noticed the moldy odor. We were able to open the window for about 3 inches to let fresh air in. Old furnitures, fixtures, and decor. The shower head was moldy and not clean. I will not return.
Manager Response: Jun_Cruz,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your stay at our hotel, on behalf of the entire staff I want to apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered during your stay.  Our windows only open slightly to ensure guest safety, we will definitely take your feedback into consideration and use it to improve our hotel in the future.  We hope you will choose to give our hotel another chance.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Marriott should remove their name from this hotel
Summary: Run down hotel that should not have any association with the Marriott Brand. I never took my shoes off in my own room that should give you an idea.  In all of my travels this has been the worst experience in terms of cleanliness and just basic sanitation.  My coworkers also have the same situations in their rooms as well so there was no escaping the mess.
Manager Response: KYA1106,  We appreciate your feedback, and apologize that you were not satisfied with your stay, I will be discussing your review with our housekeeping manager in order to improve the cleanliness in our rooms, we certainly hope you would choose to give us another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  I can definitely understand your frustration based on the accounts of your stay, and for that I am truly sorry, thank you again for leaving feedback that we can use to get things turned around at this hotel.  Thank You

Summary: This hotel was dirty with lots of litter. The parking lot, stairs, elevator, hallway were the same. The rooms were outdated. Definitely need remodel. The hotel building smells moldy. It was out family vacation and one of the room's bathroom had water leaking from the top. So surprise the hotel could still be part of the Marriott property for poor quality/maintenance. I would not stay here not not recommend anyone stay here. BTW, the breakfast was so small and had empty meal at 8 o'clock. No one clean the table either.
Manager Response: D2255ZF_  I want to first apologize on behalf of the entire staff regarding the poor experience you encountered at our hotel, I definitely can understand based on the things you outlined how frustrating it can be.  I will be following up with our department managers in order to better improve our processes and improve the guest experience at our hotel.  When the hotel was first built Towneplace Suites did not offer complimentary breakfast, it was not till after the policy was changed which is why unfortunately our breakfast area is so limited.  We will also speak with our breakfast attendants to see what can be done to improve the service at breakfast.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again if you ever come back through our neck of the woods.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Great service and location for what we needed
Summary: We needed an affordable place to stay that has a kitchen near Disneyland and ended up staying here. While the property is a bit dated and lower price helps to overlook much of that, the staff were extremely helpful and truly made the experience a very good one. One staff member in particular, named Joy, went out of her way to make the experience a smooth one for us.  So grateful for her extra efforts and we would definitely stay at this property again.
Manager Response: kelwaraz,  Thank you for your review, we are very happy that you enjoyed your stay, the fact you went out of your way to recognize one of our employees specifically is awesome!  Joy is one of our longest tenured, and strongest employees at the front desk, she is always looking to make all of our guests happy when they walk through our doors.  I will certainly let Joy know that she was able to make an impact on your stay, we hope you will choose to visit us again in the near future.  Thank You

Summary: Positives first: Free parking, hot breakfast, great location to drive to Disneyland (the reason for our trip), ideal set up for families with kitchen, separate room. The front desk staff was friendly and tried to be helpful. The main bed seemed newer and was comfortable.  Negatives: My husband and I stay pretty much exclusively in Marriott hotels, and have stayed in several categories.  Because I have trusted the Marriott name and brand, I was not at all prepared for the state of our room. The couch was stained, the floor was covered in crumbs, the carpet was literally shredded, there was dust in the corners (months worth of dust- hadn't been properly cleaned or vacuumed in months), the hallways/ doors were dirty, the guest laundry was disgusting, the AC unit smelled mildewey,
Manager Response: kasseyrichins,  Thank you for taking the time to outline your experience while visiting our hotel; we strive to have all of our guests satisfied when they visit our hotel, it is obvious we failed in this instance.  We are working on improving our process to eliminate a lot of the issues you outlined, and we are again very sorry that this was an inconvenience during your stay, we will definitely work to improve in order to satisfy all of our guests going forward.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary: On Friday night, I took a list of things that were missing from my room that are typically available at TownePlace Suites, knowing this after staying in your property for years. Yesterday, I went to work for a few hours, but returned in mid-afternoon, not feeling well, so took a nap. During my nap, even with a "DO NOT DISTURB" sign on my door, Housekeeping knocked on my door. I called the front desk and spoke to the assistant manager and told him it would be okay for the items to be replenished today.  Today, I left the hotel at 9 AM, and returned after 4:30 PM. Nothing yet has even been touched in my room. I'd planned on cooking my dinner tonight, but now have to wait for Housekeeping to get around to coming to my room and then hand-wash my dishes, as I had no dish cloth (a
Manager Response: KennySoCal,  I want to first apologize for any inconvenience you experienced while staying at our hotel, we certainly appreciate the communication via email and this review to provide feedback on what we need to improve on.  I have spoken with my housekeeping manager to ensure that these issues are resolved as soon as possible, our hotel definitely is not perfect and requires improvements, something that our staff is working on improving every single day.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when visiting Disneyland
Summary: This hotel is in a great location, very easy to get an uber or lyft to take you to the Disney theme park. Joy at the front desk was super nice and put our two rooms next to each other, which made planning for our days much easier. She even helped us out by storing our bags when our rooms weren't ready so we could go have fun at the park. She is a very nice lady! Thank you Joy, I hope you see this.
Manager Response: kurtc651,  We are so excited you enjoyed your stay at our hotel, Joy at the front desk is one of the leaders at the hotel, and she goes above and beyond for everyone in order to make their stay a positive one.  We certainly hope you will choose to stay at our hotel again the next time you're going to Disneyland.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Dated rooms, unclean hallways, room not ready
Summary: Having read previous reviews that the hotel has a hard time with 4PM checkins we checked in at 5:15.  The front desk informed us that the room was not ready and would be at least 30 more minutes. We were told to have a seat in their tiny lobby next to 5 other people who's rooms were also not ready. Just before 6pm we we re e told our room was ready.  Our room was across from the main building.  Upon entry the hallways was dirty with debris on the floor, walls marked up.  Elevator was unclean as well.  Our room was clean however dated. Kitchen is strangely crooked.....the floor slopes or something because the fridge looks like the leaning tower.  Hotel was quiet.  It's close to Angel stadium (why we picked this hotel). Its walking distance to restaurants.   The location is great.
Manager Response: Jowly1,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience while visiting our property.  First let me please apologize on behalf of the entire staff that you did not have an enjoyable stay, unfortunately on that day some of our staff had unforeseen issues which caused us to be under-staffed for the day.  This in by no means is an excuse for your negative experience, we will be looking re-visiting our process in order to avoid these problems again in the future.  We hope you will choose to visit us again in the future.  Thank You

Summary: This hotel has seen better days. The public spaces ie the hallways and elevators are so dinged up and dingy. The room was ok but very dated, particularly the kitchen and bathroom. If you have a bunch of people and can get a low rate here and have low expectations it’s ok but not great.
Manager Response: Chandra R,  Thank you for your review while visiting our hotel, I would like to formally offer our most sincere apologies you did not enjoy your stay our hotel staff will work diligently in order to improve on all of the areas you outlined, we hope you will choose to visit us again in the near future.  Thank You

Summary: I came here with my two sons to see a Ducks game at the nearby Honda Center and visit Knott’s Berry Farm. Because we were thinking of doing a week long stay for Disneyland in a few months, and having Platinum status in the Bonvoy program, I thought this would be a good test drive of this hotel. Glad I did that, because I’m doubtful we would come back.   Upon check in, the friendly desk clerk noted my platinum status with Marriott, and said our room was ready. I had booked a two bedroom suite and she noted it was room 420, which was on the top floor and furthest from the elevator.  When I got on the elevator, I noticed a couple of spots where the siding of the elevator walls were missing.  Not a good sign about the hotel’s upkeep.  Getting off the elevator, I noticed the hallway
Manager Response: blkjck5697,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience while visiting our hotel, I want to first apologize for any inconvenience you encountered during your stay.  We strive to have all of our guests satisfied, however we obviously failed with respect to your visit.  I will be in contact with our housekeeping and maintenance staff in order to rectify all the issues you outlined in your review, we are grateful that you brought it to our attention, and we will ensure to improve for our better guests.  Our hotel is definitely not perfect, and we strive to improve every single day.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Convenient location, family-friendly, but very basic
Summary: This property combines two valuable things: a location convenient to various Anaheim attractions (stadium, Honda Center, Disney, etc) and reasonably-priced family-friendly rooms with kitchenettes.  For many, this will be sufficient.  We were not able to stay in the two-bedroom suite we booked, but were re-accommodated in two adjoining rooms, which was acceptable.  We were told this was due to a plumbing failure, which speaks to the age/condition of the property.  The rooms were clean, but very basic, consistent with the price point.  However, the A/C units are *very* loud.  I would not have been able to sleep with it on, but fortunately it was cool in the evenings and I did not need to.  The walls are thin, so be prepared for some noise from the hall and adjoining rooms, if that
Manager Response: gnetweker,  Your review is greatly appreciated, we appreciate your loyalty!  We apologize for the inconvenience regarding your room type, we do our best to accommodate all guests whenever possible.  We will also take your feedback and look into issues at our hotel in order to improve our future guests experiences.  We hope you will choose to visit us again in the near future.  Thank You

Summary: If you consider yourself a Marriott purist, this is not the hotel for you. If you’re looking for an ok place to sleep, this hotel is affordable, offers free parking, and is conveniently located.   My husband and I booked a last minute weekend out to explore the breweries in Anaheim. We chose this hotel because of the things listed above.   The rooms are dated, have an awkward smell, and cleanliness is questionable. Our bathroom was the biggest let down. The floor and toilet were clean. We had 3 sets of face/hand towels and washcloths but only 2 full-sized towels. Seemed a little odd. The mirror was oddly hand-painted on the bottom and it was peeling off. A drawer pull had clearly broken off and instead of finding one to match to replace it with, it was replaced with one of a
Manager Response: MAOC2019,  Thank you for your review, we welcome and encourage all guest feedback as it helps us to provide a blueprint in order to improve the property, and our staff service.  We will definitely address all of the issues you listed out in your review, we are curious regarding your comment on the television, as we do not have any televisions on rolling carts?  Perhaps you confused our hotel with another?  We hope you will choose to visit us again in the near future!  Thank You

Summary: We arrived just after 4pm to checkin only to find a very long line exiting out of the entrance of the hotel all for guests ready to checkin. Very small lobby.   We got checked in to our room and found the key card did not work for one of the doors into our building but did work for another door that was further away from our room.   We found that the sink was leaking and called the front desk and they sent maintenance workers to fix it. Ended up needing to replace a garbage disposal. Also had to call for maintenance to fix a tub drain that was not draining properly.   The pool was dirty and was really cold. The hot tub was dirty as well but cleaner than the pool.   Very small lobby, which didn’t accommodate any more than 20 people to sit down for breakfast. Most mornings we had
Manager Response: Shaelyn_love,  We appreciate your review, and will use your feedback as a way to improve our hotel, when you checked in the housekeeping staff was running behind due to the previous night being sold out, and on top of that there were technical malfunctions with the computer system, this certainly is not an excuse nor an issue for guests however unfortunately untimely instances occur.  Our lobby/breakfast area is limited in seating and we provide outside seating, and guests will also take their food back to their rooms.  We certainly apologize that the food was not warm on your first day, and that will be addressed with the breakfast staff.  The ART bus as you stated is also not perfect, the staff tries to provide as much information as possible, based on information we receive from the City of Anaheim. (who runs the shuttle)  We also apologize regarding the insect in your room, we utilize one of the nations largest companies in order to provide preventative maintenance and will alert them ASAP.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary: The line to check-in is 40-people deep at 4 pm, and no one’s rooms are ready. So after you wait an hour in line, you’re stuck sitting in the lobby until further notice. Elite status doesn’t matter, and not even a “sorry” was offered.
Manager Response: rachelarachel,  We appreciate you took the time to write about your experience at our hotel, we apologize that there was a line during check in time, the staff unfortunately did not have all rooms available at check in due to the hotel being sold out the previous night, the computer system also went down right at check in time which impeded our ability to get guests checked in in a timely manner.  We sincerely apologize and are not trying to make any excuses, as these problems should not cause a burden for our guests, we will look to improve our processes in order to handle these types of situations in the future.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Great Service, but dated and in need of renovation.
Summary: This is our fourth time to this property. I stay in Marriott Brands almost weekly so I know their product. Recently, we stayed there over the weekend in a 2 bedroom suite and I stayed solo during the week. The soft product is great. Everyone is pleasant, they attend to issues appropriately but I have to call out a few areas for improvement. Lastly, I realize this is not a 5 Star property and I'm sure it serves well for the Disney market- these comments are coming from a well seasoned traveler and intended only to distinguish this property from other Marriott brands throughout the country.   First observation. Inconsistent treatment for Titatium members. The first stay we were awarded points as our gift. Second visit I was awarded points and a market item.  Why the difference?
Manager Response: David A,  We are so grateful of your review, we certainly appreciate the time you took to write about your experience at our hotel.  We definitely have areas to improve on and will take your review and share it with the staff in order to improve our process, we value all feedback, especially negative ones as it provides areas of opportunity in order to improve the hotel.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future, and again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We stayed here for a Disney trip and the hotel does not meet to Marriott standards at all! The drains in the sink and bathroom barely worked. When the room above us was taking a shower there was a pretty heavy leak from the ceiling. Very concerning. And no hot water for us during our time. There were plenty of stains throughout the room. Ohhh and if you’re a light sleeper.... forget it. The walls are so thin you hear absolutely everything! The hotel is very tired and is in a desperate need for a renovation. Should not have the Marriott name, it did not hold the standards at all!
Manager Response: Kristine D,  We apologize that you were not satisfied during your stay, we will definitely look into the items you outlined, and work to rectify them as soon as possible.  We hope you will consider to stay with us again in the future as we think you will have an improved experience.  Thank You

Summary: Joy was super helpful! She was kind and let us check in way before the normal check in time which meant more time at Disneyland! We were glad to not have to leave the park just to put our bags in the room.  And they offer a great hot breakfast with a nice variety!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our hotel! We're glad that Joy was able to put a smile on your face with her willingness to go the extra mile. We hope that we have the opportunity to serve you again in the future!

Summary: Hotel not cared for. Barely compare to any other Marriott or TownePlace we've stayed. Bad plumbing in bathroom tub-shower, no tv remote, broken coffee maker, outsode security door broken. Asked for hangers 3 times, got some, then someone opens door without knocking to deliver more 3 hours later. Asked for extra towels, ignored.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property. We're sorry to hear that the service experienced was less than satisfactory. We are working with the appropriate departments to ensure that the issues outlined are corrected as quickly as possible. We hope to serve you better in your future visits to Anaheim.

Summary: If you're from out-of-town and are attending an Anaheim Angels game, this is the place to stay!  A short walk to the stadium (maybe closer then some parking).  The place is clean, staff friendly.  There was an issue with the elevator the second day we were there, but no other concerns.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of our property. We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, but can't help wonder what we could have done to earn that extra point. If you have a moment, please pass any comments or concerns along to patrick.yoon@interstatehotels.com so that we can provide a perfect experience next time you're in Anaheim.

Summary: Thank you for the amazing services and excellent accommodations - especially the early check-in, complimentary breakfast and lots of parking were a plus! We loved the walking distance to the Angels Stadium, Denny’s & Togo’s! Our next trip will be to take advantage of your shuttle service to Disneyland!!
Manager Response: exgintl,  We want to say thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel, we hope the Angels won!  We look forward to another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary: As we walked into the lobby we were greeted by the front desk clerk we notice the lobby was very clean and smelled fresh. Our room was also clean and tidy and the bed was very comfortable and the sheets were clean, the kitchenette was a plus as we were able to warm or cook some meals .We were completely satisfied with the hotel and will come back.
Manager Response: Charles T,  Thank you for your review, we appreciate your loyalty, and the fact you took the time to write about your experience on Trip Advisor is much appreciated.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary: The room was very nice.  The hotel is walking distance to the Anaheim Angels and numerous restaurants.  Continental breakfast was excellent both days.  Last but not least, "Joy" must be the best front desk person we've ever dealt with.  She was extremely friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Brian M,  We appreciate your review, we are so excited you enjoyed your stay, and found our location to be suitable for your needs.  The fact you took the time to mention our staff by name is truly an honor.  Joy is one of our most senior employees and she is always looking to go above and beyond for our guests.  She will be very excited that she was able to make a positive impression during your stay.  Thank You

Summary: As won. Can walk to stadium and food. Go A's. What more t say to fill this apqce. P asdfghjklqwertyippoitreqqguhxfidcifdjgdgshhdhgsudufuryrydyidisueuw9wudt rdrd858ddyffygct66tcytcc6tc6rdrxrd6rcytc6tf6tf6tf
Manager Response: Dan F,  We are glad you enjoyed the baseball game, and we hope to have another opportunity to serve you again!  Thank You

Summary: The front desk person who check us in was very nice. But unfortunately we had to move rooms three times. Our last room was good. When we left the room to go down to check out the elevators were not in service and we had to take the steps down from the 4th floor, inconvenient. Beside that the stay was only one night and the customer service made up for it.
Manager Response: BEN P,  Please accept my sincere apologies due to the fact that your stay was not a positive one, we are glad that you were able to finally settle into a room that was satisfactory, whenever guests are not satisfied the staff does everything in their power to try and rectify any issues.  We hope you will choose to stay with us again in the near future.  Thank You

Summary: The staff was so friendly, the room was clean, there was a complimentary cookie and 2 water bottles in the room when we arrived. The room also had a fridge, microwave, oven and stove that became useful for us. The breakfast had a variety of choices and was good. It was a great location for us as we were traveling back and forth from the Honda convention center. Was a great experience and we were very glad to have booked with Towneplace Marriott in Anaheim.
Manager Response: SamiJeanne89,  Thank you for your review, we are so happy you enjoyed your stay, we hope to have another opportunity to serve you again the future.  Thank You

Summary: The hotel is very comfortable the staff are amazing, I stayed here for over 100 nights, from past experience, I found  a hotel room was just a place to sleep and yet I actually felt at home here, any problems were promptly rectified  the low star rating is because of the amenities (although i found the above average) coffee, tea and chocolate is available free in the lobby 24/7, there is a stove, microwave and coffee maker available in the room   its close to Disney, Angels stadium and the Honda centre I would recommend this hotel to anyone and will certainly stay here again if I am in Anaheim
Manager Response: jdrew2017  We are so appreciative of your loyalty, we're honored to have you as a guest!  Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at our hotel, we hope you will choose to visit us again in the near future.  Thank You

Summary: I highly recommend thid hotel, cuz its extremely nice and the staff were all so kind and generous. Im definitely considering going back for another get away. The rooms are really clean and spacious. The breakfast was amazing & the staff was also very kind & welcoming
Manager Response: jmnycrckt3,  We sincerely appreciate your review, the fact you took the time to write about your experience at our hotel is appreciated!  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future!  Thank You

Summary: I planned a week long stay in Anaheim to take my family to Disney Land.  I have 6 kids so I booked two rooms.  The rooms were adequate as I didn't want to spend an arm and a leg just for sleeping purposes.  This hotel satisfied our needs and provided a shuttle (for a cost) to Disney Land.  Overall it was good and I would do it again.
Manager Response: tedsson217,  We're so excited you enjoyed your stay!  We hope you had a blast at Disneyland, we hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future!

Summary: Amazing location, walking distance from Angels stadium, Starbucks, super close to Disney, etc.    We are Titanium (almost Ambassador) members, and stay with Marriotts because we typically get great service and Marriott properties are typically consistently good.  My wife and I came here for 8 days, we had to have surgery at a nearby hospital.  The rooms smell like mold, there was a huge wet spot on the carpet (yikes!) we had to ask for housekeeping 4 times (by phone, walking to the front desk, tipping the front desk, then finally had to track down a housekeeper in the hallway on a separate floor after walking the entire building).  Don't stay here!  We are stuck since we're recovering for surgery and would move if we could... don't make the same mistake we did!  Also, thanks to
Manager Response: Jaypb,  I apologize for any inconvenience you encountered during your stay, we appreciate that you took the time to write about your experience, we will definitely look at all items listed and correct them right away.  Thank you for also mentioning our housekeeping staff, they work tirelessly in order to keep the hotel clean for all our guests.  We certainly have areas to improve and are working towards those goals everyday.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Harvest Crusade stay was blessed with great staff,great room, and fellow hotel guests
Summary: Our stay was graced by an early check in (we caught a red eye from Hawaii and prayed for room availability), thank you Joy! We were welcomed for breakfast which was so plentiful, and granted, be patient everyone, they're feeding all of us, including those still in their beds! Domi kept refilling waffle batter (blueberry and original), cooking omelets (cheese, etc dep on the day), yummy bacon (or ham), whole eggs, oatmeal with fixings, breads, muffins, bagels, with fixings, cereals, milk, yogurt, juices, coffee, tea, whole fruits of bananas oranges and apples. The actual hotel room was spacious with kitchen, toaster, micro etc. Liked having to use my room key to access the hotel building. There's an exercise room with towels, ice maker and laundry. Didn't drive but there was lots
Manager Response: Karen S,  We are so happy you enjoyed your stay, thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at our hotel. Domi is a very diligent worker and helps to ensure guests are satisfied at breakfast. Joy is also our main front desk associate in the mornings and she'll be very excited you mentioned her by name!  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the near future!  Thank You

Summary: Have stayed here numerous times visiting CA family. This visit not great at all. Room was not very clean on arrival. Sticky floors. AC in bedroom one a rattling mess. One day of trip, did not receive suite cleaning at all. Came home late at night to find it just as we left it 11 am. Products such as coffee, shampoo etc. were not re-stocked on daily basis of our 5 day stay, although clearly all of what we’d received initially were being used up. Had to ask for everything, regularly. Worst part...my daughter left behind a ring in her room after check-out and we got an ‘oh well, call you if we find it’ about that when we called today. Truly awful housekeeping throughout, no accountability accepted when we brought concerns to light in a polite manner, and if my daughter’s ring was
Manager Response: lopper,  Thank you for your review, I want to first extend my sincere apologies on behalf of the hotel that you were not satisfied with your stay, housekeeping definitely needs to improve their procedures regarding re-stocking of guest supplies, and also apologize no one has reached out to you regarding your ring, I will follow up with the staff to see if anything was turned in and if so we will reach out to you directly.  We hope you will choose to visit us again the next time you're in the area.  Thank You

Summary: We chose this because it was an easy walk to the Angels stadium for the ballgame.  The location was great, but the property itself is very run down.  We had a two bedroom suite which was great for the space, but it smelled very musty from the time we came in and was very humid. We kept the windows open the whole time during our stay but it never changed.  The breakfast area is extremely small and we were never able to actually sit down and eat.  The breakfast choices were very limited as well.  If you want to be able to walk to the game, this motel is good, but I would not choose it for the actual property.
Manager Response: familytraveler060904,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay we apologize regarding any unpleasant odor in your room, and the fact you didn't enjoy our breakfast.  We will take your feedback and utilize it to improve all of our guest's experience at our hotel.  We hope you will decide to give us another chance.  Thank You

Summary: Totally run down and disgusting. Was shocked that this is owned by Marriott. Would have left and asked for my money back if I actually had time to find another place. Room was filthy and most things were broken and worn out. I would never walk barefoot in this room. Should have taken pictures to share.
Manager Response: A1798AFdebbies,  Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience at our hotel, we apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered, and we are taking steps to improving our hotel as quickly as possible.  We hope you will provide us another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary: Great location. Perfect for Angels stadium and other Orange county activities. Close to fwys. Hotel is pretty outdated and needs some revamping. Room had a musty smell to it and the jacuzzi was going to be closed for a few days. Laundry is pretty pricy to do just one load. But is close to lots of good food options.
Manager Response: Wendy R,  Thank you for your review, our hotel is currently in the process of doing all we can in order to provide a better guest experience that includes the pool/Jacuzzi area.  The Jacuzzi was out of order from Sunday night to Tuesday night due to scheduled deep cleaning.  We hope you will understand that processes like these are necessary in order to maintain the hotel, and apologize for any inconvenience.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary: Location was the only good thing. Having been a Marriott Rewards member for many years, I have to say this is by far not up to the Marriott standards I am accustomed to. Traveling with my family we had a 2 bedroom suit, a bad musty odor the second you open the door and the humidity in the room was surprising, especially in California! The breakfast was ok, not Marriott standard; however, remembering when TownePlace didn't even serve and actual breakfast... Overall my family and I were very disappointed as we can always count on any Marriott property being a great hotel. At check out I was not even asked the typical "How was your stay".
Manager Response: pktfanman,  We apologize for the inconvenience during your stay, we always want our guests to be satisfied when they visit our hotel, and we obviously failed in this instance.  We will look at ways in order to improve the guest experience based on your feedback, and hope you will give us another chance in the future.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Walking distance to The Big A
Summary: I showed up early and was assured that my room would be ready after a day game and it was. In addition recognizing my Rewards membership I was upgraded at no charge.  The staff was probably the friendliest I have met in the last three-four months and Patrick helped me score some cheap tickets to the ballgame. The hotel while older may show a little age was still clean and comfortable.  Restaurants in walking distance and more available if you will drive a couple miles.  nice pool. I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: TexCol56,  Thank you for writing about your experience at our hotel!  Our staff works very hard to ensure that all of our guests are satisfied during their stay.  We're so happy you enjoyed your visit with us and hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary: Came to Anaheim specifically to see a Angels game with my son. Stayed in a two bedroom suite with a kitchenette. The room was excellent and my 15 year old son was thrilled to have his own room. Walking distance to the stadium
Manager Response: krudean,  Please extend our gratitude to your son, we appreciate that you took the time to write about your experience at our hotel.  The fact our hotel is walking distance to Angels stadium is certainly something a lot of fans take advantage of.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary Heading: Tourney Stay - Would stay there again...
Summary: Stayed in Studio Suite - 1 adult one 16 year old ... there for a tourney.  Convenient location and great price as we had to be there for 8 nights.   Close to food, stadium, disneyland.  If there are just two travelling the Studio was perfect size room to have... the kitchen space also made it easier for the long stay as you could cook a meal in your room...
Manager Response: Melanie F,  Thank you for your review, we absolutely love all of our sports teams when they stay at our hotel, we hope your team did well in the tournament!  Your review will be shared with our staff, and we hope you will choose to visit us again soon.  Thank You

Summary: I stayed at this hotel before and the place is definitely improving, the staff is always so polite and accommodating, the rooms are very large, and spacious.  The breakfast area was a little tight, but the employee was very quick and helped everyone there.  It’s not perfect but the staff service, and the fact it seemed like they’re improving the place was ***** rating for me! Will definitely be back
Manager Response: Jjccccc,  Thank you for your review, we're so excited that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel.  We are working hard in order to improve the hotel based on all guest feedback.  We hope to have another opportunity to serve you again in the future.  Thank You

Summary: I was going to give it a middling grade based upon the dated rooms, so-so cleaning, lousy breakfast, and lackluster maintenance; however something happened during the stay that made me downgrade this place.  At about the middle of our week's stay, my family returned from a long day at Disney to find our room door propped open.  The room was accessible to anybody passing by for hours unchecked.  Nothing was missing, and I did get a sincere apology, however this was beyond the pale for acceptability. My senses heightened, I started taking photos and notes: moldy showers, leaking dishwasher, housekeeper's wet work glove left on bathroom vanity, exposed carpet tacks at bathroom door floor.... The location is terrific, however, for Disney (an Uber or Lyft is under $10) and the price
Manager Response: spartan_timothy,  I want to extend our most sincerest apologies regarding your stay, we always want our guests to feel satisfied when they visit our hotel, it is obvious we failed in this instance.  We will be passing your information with our staff in order to ensure this does not happen in the future, we hope you will please give us another chance to serve you again the next time you're in the area.  Thank You

Summary: It's very close to the Angels Baseball Stadium.  You can walk over to watch a game.  The shuttle was very easy to catch since it stopped in front of the hotel.  I only have a few complaints:  the swimming pool was dirty (you could see the dirt on the bottom of the pool)  I also had mold on the bathroom ceiling.  They do need to start updating their rooms, but for the price, it was ok.  We didn't have breakfast at the hotel, due to the fact that there was no room to sit.  Too small of an area. Not sure if they feed their customers from both buildings.
Manager Response: Thank you for your informative review. We have passed your comments along to the appropriate departments so we can ensure that this was an isolated incident. We apologize for any inconveniences experienced during your stay. We hope that we have the opportunity to serve you better in the future.

Summary: I booked a 2 bdrm suite and paid for it online. Before arriving, I tried calling the hotel to ask if we can register early but with no success. After several attempts, I gave up. When my party and I arrived, I asked if I can register early. I was told that they did not have any rooms available at the moment and that they will call me once one comes available. They took my card for incidentals and pre-registered me. We left and came back at 5 pm. The attendant informs me that they do not have any 2 bdrm suites available because the one that was assigned to be was placed out of service. So he checked us in to 2 standard suites that were not connecting. He was not very accommodating. If this was the case then why didn't they just allow us to check-in early for these same rooms.
Manager Response: Shey D,  I want to apologize regarding the issues you incurred during your stay, unfortunately when you arrived the room type that you reserved we were unable to have ready to you due to damage done by the previous guest, which caused us to oversell for that night.  This does not happen often, and we apologize that it happened during your stay.  You are absolutely correct in that the hotel needs to be improved, and that will begin with the staff, we are working to turn this hotel around in order to provide a positive guest experience for all of our future guests.  I hope you will give us another chance in the future, should the opportunity present itself.  Thank You

Summary: I stayed here because I have a large family of 6, and there are multiple rooms, for the price, it's hard to beat in the area near Disneyland. Buttttt... it has really gone downhill since the last time I stayed there. AC didn't work, the room was dirty, floors and shower were moldy, it has a kitchen but nothing to cook with, and the front desk just kept saying they were out of stuff or it's broken, as if that was an acceptable excuse. Breakfast was mediocre, and there wasn't enough food for the number of guests there.eating area was tiny and crowded. Things did not get taken care of even after I asked. I wouldn't recommend staying here anymore.
Manager Response: Good_travels7  First let me apologize that you did not enjoy your stay while visiting our hotel, we certainly strive to have all of our guests satisfied when they walk through our doors. We are grateful you decided to stay at our hotel, and we will use your feedback in order to provide better service to all of our guests in the future.  We hope you will give us another opportunity should it arise.  Thank You

Summary: This hotel needs serious update. The room smelled very bad, a high humidity odor (molding) inside the room, you can smell a as soon as you entered the room. Bathroom, kitchen, carpet, furniture and bed needs to be replace.
Manager Response: Jonathon C,  We definitely need to improve, our staff will be working diligently in order to provide a better guest experience for all of our future guests.  Your feedback will be taken into consideration in future decisions made by the hotel staff regarding the condition of the hotel.  We hope you will choose to visit us again in the near future.  Thank You

Summary: My family and I have stayed at this hotel a total of 7 times in the last 3 years. Regardless of the time of year or the duration of the stay this hotel has gone above and beyond my wildest expectations. Very close to Disneyland, not to far from Huntington Beach and breakfast is always yummy! This hotel will be our go to for many years to come.
Manager Response: Davidpalacious1127,  We appreciate your kind words, and we're are excited you enjoyed your stay, we hope you will visit us again soon!  Thank You

Summary: We rented for a week, the hotel first floor had a stench of a dead mouse. The pool was dirty, not inviting to swim. The bathroom had mold on the ceiling and I believe it got worse as we were there due to five of us showering twice a day.

The hotel room offered the amenities we needed to be able to keep light snacks at the ready and we were even able to enjoy time by the swimming pool. All good.

Summary: Older, but fairly well maintained. Free breakfast nothing special, but good to have something readily available..and it is free. We were on the first floor, street side of the B Building, but very little traffic so absolutely no traffic noise problem. But there can be foot noise from the 2nd floor depending upon the occupants. All staff friendly and helpful, but housekeeping was a little lax at times. Did not replace plastic cups in bathroom, forgot towels one day, and did not empty a trash can one day.  Easy 10-minute walk to Angel Stadium. If driving, 10-20 minutes to Disneyland. There is an ART shuttle stop (ARTIC route 15) to Disneyland at the hotel, but if missing the shuttle, it could take another 30-40 minutes for the next. He did a super job with every guest ahead of us and then got us checked in with a professional approach that is to be commended. The other thing that we were not too happy with is the landscaping crew started using leaf blowers right outside the bedroom window at 7:00 am, which woke us all up. If you're staying for Disneyland, we strongly recommend taking the ART shuttle instead of parking. It will save you time and money. Overall, a solid choice in the Disneyland area.
