Summary: I was in town to perform at House of Blues Downtown Disney and decided to make this band roadtrip into a short family vacation as well, since we'll be next to the "Happiest Place on Earth".  I chose TownPlace Suites because it's a Marriott and I landed a great room rate.  This location is a little over 1.5 miles from the Disneyland resort, literally across the street from Angels Stadium and stones throw from Honda Center(Ducks arena).  The hotel location seems very safe nestled next to a brand new loft apartment community.  Also conveniently close by is a McDonalds, Starbucks, Panda Express and Dennys.  The lobby was clean and Joy at the frontdesk was very kind, courteous and helpful.  Our first floor room was clean and just the right size for my family of four, which included a
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your amazing review,  as well as your wonderful comments towards Joy. I will be sure to pass along your great comments to her and the rest of the team.  Thank you again and hope to see you back on your next Disneyland Adventure!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Good choice for our family of 6 stay in Anaheim
Summary: Our 2 bed room suite had a kitchen and the living room had a sleeper sofa. This worked wonderfully for our six night stay. The staff was very helpful.  The free breakfast is several choices - cereals, fruits, eggs, sausage, waffles, breads, bagels and assortment of juices. We were there over the super bowl weekend, and the staff fixed up a nice snack table for the game. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your 5 star review,  and kind words for my staff. I hope to see you on your next trip to Anaheim. Hospitably, Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: My husband, 12 year old son and I stayed here for two nights in December 2015.  Chris was friendly at check-in.  We chose this property because we wanted to use points.  It was clean and well prepared but it just felt dated.  They only have Queen beds; no King.  We were close to Disneyland; you can't walk it but it's literally 5 minutes down the road.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review as well as your wonderful comments for Chris.  I will be sure to pass these along to him as well as the rest of the team.  Thank you again and I hope to see you on your next Disneyland Adventure.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Trip to Anaheim for a Ducks Game
Summary: The hotel was great from the start. We were greeted with a warm friendly welcome from the staff upon arrival. Check in was quick and the room was perfect. It was about a 3/4 mile walk to the Honda center which was fine. There are several restaurant options and a Starbucks is steps from the hotel. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Jan 17, 2016  Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your recent stay as well as your 5 star review! We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in Anaheim!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: The hotel looks not so fresh, but it was a convenience place to stay very close to anything if you most need to stay at Anaheim for business or pleasure.  The Breakfast was not bad just eggs , sausage , coffee, juice and cheese.  It is near to restaurants , the Stadium and the outlet malls.   The Staff is very nice , the night clerk and old man was extremely courteous and help full, great guy.   The Hotel does have free wifi and parking lot.  I certainly return with my family.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review and kind words for my staff.  I hope to see you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Hospitably,   Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: All-suite hotel in the Angels stadium area. Paid $88 for a queen suite room (2 adults+2 kids) with a pull-out couch and kitchen. Free parking, wifi, breakfast. Denny's, Carl's Jr., Panda Express and Starbucks are steps away. Front desk staff very friendly. Shuttle buses (for a reasonable fee) hourly to and from Disneyland. 15 miles to John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for your feedback.  I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites on your next visit to Anaheim.  Hospitably,   Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised with my stay.  I don't think the reviews here give this property justice.  Yes, it may be considered  at the "lower end" of the Marriott chain, but it met all of the Marriott standards.  My daughter & I  booked a two night stay using "points".  We were making a very quick trip to Disneyland from the SF Bay Area to see her niece dance in the Disneyland Parade.  We usually have her two sons with us and stay closer to the park, but because it was just the two of us, it was less points to stay here.....a very short Uber ride to the park.  Check in staff was  extremely courteous and professional, especially Mae.  The rooms were very clean, bed super comfortable, kitchen, although we did not use it, was efficient and fully stocked for an extended stay.  We
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review.  I am glad to see that you were able to have an enjoyable stay with us.  I hope to see you again on your next Disneyland Adventure!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: Came in for a 2 day business trip, and it was just what I needed! I love that they all have full kitchens- even if I don't need it. But the FULL coffee pot is always helpful! Staff was friendly, location is prime.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful 5 star review!  I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites Anaheim.   Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Great room, but awful couch bed.
Summary: We had a two bedroom suite with my boyfriend and both our moms for the weekend. The room was really nice and we had plenty of space. However, the couch bed was AWFUL. We had to pull the mattress off the couch, put the cushions on the floor and then put the mattress on top. It was still just ok, but much better than the couch springs. After spending 15+ hours in Disneyland, we still slept well despite the less than ideal bed.   My mom and mother in law said the beds in the bedrooms were great and had no complaints. The bathroom and shower were great, lots of hot water and plenty of water pressure. Each bedroom and the living room had its own heater and A/C unit to control as we liked, which was nice.   The hotel was very clean. There could be some updates here and there, but
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review and all your feedback.  You will be happy to know that I am currently working with the owners to replace all the sofa mattresses to a more comfortable memory foam.  I hope to have these all replaced in the beginning of 2016.  Thank you again and I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites Anaheim on your next Disneyland Adventure.  Hospitably,   Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Close to attractions, below Marriott service standards but you get what you pay for
Summary: Look.  I'm not going to lie. I'd stay there again because it's in walking distance to the ballpark and it's the cheapest stay for a Marriott brand near Disneyland.  And actually, I've stayed there 2 times in 2 years.  As a Marriott Rewards member, I have an expectation of the service provided and the rooms I will stay in.  Unfortunately, I must say that TownePlace Suites are below my expectations of the Marriott brand.  If I didn't know better, perhaps I'd provide an additional star.  The rooms have evidence of wear and tear:  chipped furniture and towels are worn down to threads.    The front desk person who worked the graveyard shift the night I arrived did not make me feel welcomed.  The day I checked out, the GM gave me his card and asked me to let him know about my stay. I
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review.  I am so sorry to hear that we did not live up to your expectations and I am even more sorry that I did not respond back to your email.  I can assure you that my goal every day is to ensure guest satisfaction for every guest which is why I ask guests to reach out to me personally if their stay did not live up to expectations.  I personally apologize that your email went unanswered as my goal is to answer any and all guests that reach out to me in a timely manner.  There is no excuse as to why this email did not get responded to and I will send you an email immediately following this response in which I hope to win your business back.  Hospitably,   Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: We booked in here last minute. Good find as the accommodation was very comfortable two bedroom accommodation with kitchen facilities. Near enough to disneyland and walking distance to Angels stadium and Honda center.Was able to print tix including disneyland in reception.Only bad thing was breakfast area tiny and was chaos in the morning.Maybe plan breakfasts elsewhere as lots of  food options nearby.Otherwise  was a great find at the price.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review.  I am glad to see that you enjoyed your stay in our two bedroom suites.    While our space in the breakfast area is sometimes limited, we do provide trays and to go boxes in case any guest would like to take their breakfast up to their suites.  Thank you again for your review and I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: Located a few miles form Disneyland but a shuttle bus runs every 20 mins from outside the hotel costing $5/person round trip. Booked 2 bedroom suite which was clean and had everything for a family at a very reasonable price, breakfast was included. Service was generally excellent but had one issue with one staff member who didn't follow through with a request. Exercise rooms (2) with running equipment only & outdoor pool.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your 5 star review.  I am glad to see that we were able to help you enjoy your Disneyland Adventure even more.  Please feel free to contact me personally to discuss the service let down in more detail so I can ensure it does not happen in the future.  Thanks again and I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay | Nice Location | Great Staff
Summary: If you want to stay at reasonable prices but in comfort, stay at this hotel. The rooms are clean with kitchenette. It has an oven, microwave, burners with cutlery and crockery. The room size is good. The check in was breezing. The breakfast area is small as compared to number of rooms and occupancy. But they provide you takeaway trays and boxes to carry your breakfast to your room. The choices are same everyday. For 3 days or 4 days, this seems okay but for 15 days, one does not even want to come for breakfast. The location of the hotel is good - just on freeway 57. The housekeeping guys are good.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  I hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Stay at TownPlace Suites Anaheim !!
Summary: Had a great stay!!  We were in Anaheim to visit Disneyland.  We stayed 3 nights starting on October 10th.   My wife and I were joined by our son, his wife and our two small grandchildren, so there were six of us in all. We stayed in a two bedroom suite.  Two separate bedrooms, living area with sofa sleeper, a complete kitchen and one bathroom.  We thought only having one bathroom might be a problem but it was never an issue. The kitchen was equipped with microwave, stove/oven, full size refrigerator, large sink and dishwasher. It also was equipped with glasses, dishes, silverware, pots and pans, etc..  The room was very clean and comfortable. The staff at this hotel was excellent !!  Very friendly and extremely helpful.  The included breakfast was good.  The breakfast area is
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review.  I am so glad to hear that you had a great stay.    I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites on your next visit to Anaheim!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: We are a family of four that stayed in a one bedroom studio for 6 nights for our Disneyland trip. This is our 6th Disneyland trip and our 1st stay at TownePlace. We needed a big dog friendly place for our Shepherd and Chihuahua. You pay 100.00 one time fee per pet (limit two) for your entire stay whether it be one day or a month. We used crates while we where gone but I ready nothing that required it. Beds were comfy and clean. Kitchen was small but got the job done. We had two tvs, one in the living and the other in the bedroom. Windows could be opened, which was nice. Pool/Hot tub was small but well maintained. Breakfast area was VERY small but they had "to go" boxes so you could take food to your room to eat. Break section was also small. Waffles, precooked egg and sausage
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your review.  I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownPlace Suites Anaheim on your next visit.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: We were looking for a reasonable place to stay before I started a conference at the Anaheim Conference center, but didn't want to pay conference center prices while it was on my dime!  Nothing fancy here, but rooms were clean, kitchenette was very useful and there was a Denny's, Panda Express, Carl's Jr, McDonalds and a few other places to eat within walking distance.  I saw that they gave directions for bus service to the Disneyland parks, but with the number of people we had it was about the same price and more convenient to just drive to the parks.  We took advantage of the laundry facilities which were just $1 for a load of wash and a $1 to dry.  One thing that was a little strange is the bathroom door didn't have a lock so we had to make sure our grand kids who like opening
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review.  I look forward in welcoming you back on your next trip to Disneyland.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: I always stay with Marriott chain of hotels. So this Disneyland vacation I chose to stay at this property for 3 nights. However, I had to scoot out only after my one night. The rooms were just OK and bed was not that comfortable. Seems like a very old property in dire need of an upgrade. I had booked Queen + SofaBed in hopes of using it. However, the sofabed was not comfortable at all. The bedding provided for the sofabed was way to big for the mattress. The AC was too loud and so was the exhaust fan of the bathroom. The positioning of the Sofabed and AC was very awkward and none of them were getting any air from AC.   I asked for a room upgrade next morning but since no rooms were available I had to move out. I couldn't think of sleeping on sofabed for two more nights after
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review.  I am so sorry to hear that you will not be back to stay with us.  We take pride in providing the best possible service to all of our guests and I am sorry to hear that we failed you.  You will be happy to hear that we are currently in the process of replacing our sofa bed spring mattresses to fiber optic.  We hope to have all of these replaced within a month.  Please feel free to reach out to me personally to discuss your stay in more detail.  I would love to know the room you were in so we can check on the A/C unit and hopefully you can give me a chance to win your business back.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager 714-939-9700 Greg.Williams@Marriott.com

Summary Heading: A decent stay and very nice staff
Summary: I'll admit this was not my first choice of hotel and I was apprehensive to say the least but there was a huge convention and I booked late. So I was expecting something really awful. I was very pleasantly surprised. This property gets an unfair rap. I think they have done some pretty serious upgrades since 2014. I was very worried because of the traveler pictures and all I can say is I throughly went through the room and saw no evidence. I don't play around with that stuff and trust, had I seen it I would have been out the door and this review would reflect it.   This is not the best property in the Marriott line-up, but that is by design. It is a heavily used property near some major So Cal attractions and I think what people mistake for unclean is more along the lines of
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review and feedback.  I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites on your next trip to Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: Chose this hotel specifically for proximity to Angel Stadium. (A man checking in at the same time asked about shuttle to stadium he wasn't happy when told the hotel didn't offer one as it is so close. Hint - check directly with hotel if something is very important to your stay.) Breakfast was included in the rate - standard fare - small dining room but take out containers were included so you could take food back to your room. The person working at breakfast was very nice and concerned that everything was OK. We stayed one night so didn't use the kitchen in our room. Room had double bed, small sofa bed, desk and one chair so it would have been difficult to comfortably eat. Walls between rooms were thin and we could hear the people in the room next door. There was a small pool
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review.  I am sorry to hear that we did not live up to your expectations.  Please feel free to contact me personally to discuss your stay in more detail so I know how we can turn your three into a five.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager Greg.Williams@Marriott.com 714-939-9700

Summary: We chose this hotel for our vacation because it had two bedrooms and a kitchen.  We were traveling with a couple teenagers and wanted some privacy.  What a great hotel and at a great price.  Plus it is right on the ART bus route.   Instead of having to spend all day at Disneyland, we were able to take the bus back and forth throughout the day and evening.  The hotel is very close to grocery stores, pharmacies, and gas stations.  I almost didn't need our rental car.  The staff was extremely helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful 5 star review! I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites on your next trip to Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: Thank you to Adeline at Front Desk who was always helpful and hospitabe, qualities that ironically are so hard to find in satff at 7 start luxury hotels.  All the staff was very welcoming.  My room was spacious, equipped with a kitchen, and always very clean.  Complimentary breakfast every morning was a nice touch. Location is very good, next to the Angels stadium, and a mile or two from the convention center and Disneyland.   I had a great stay, and would be happy to return.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your 5 star review as well as your wonderful comments towards Adi.  I will be sure to pass along these comments to her.  Thank you again and I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites on your next visit to Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: We stayed here during the labor day weekend for a family vacation. The place is nice and quiet. The room is clean as well as the kitchen. The location is not too far from Disneyland Resort, which is a plus and there are some restaurants nearby.  The staff was really friendly and professional. I loved the breakfast they have in the morning and the fact that I can eat by the pool. The only complain I have is that the dining area is small other than that, me and my family's stay was pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful five star review.  I am so glad to see that you had a great stay.  I hope to see you again on your next Disneyland adventure!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a week in June on our California vacation. The hotel was clean, the room was excellent and the staff were amazing.   Aric was very visible and was eager to interact with us as guests. Jillian was a pleasure to deal with at the front desk and even gave us a courtesy call the day before we checked out to make sure our stay was satisfactory.   Rest of the staff were all great and were able to answer all questions we had regarding transportation, amenities, etc.   I will definitely be booking here in my next trip to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful 5 star review and comments towrds Jillian.  I will be sure to share this with her and the team.  See you on your next trip to Anaheim!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: Anaheim is a great place to go, so much to do! Disneyland, Knott's, Angel's Baseball, Duck's Hockey, California beaches, the list never ends. But... what do all those things have in common? People, people, people, and crappy food. When my family and I return to the TownPlace Suites each night completely exhausted and crowd weary, we get a little slice of quiet and solitude. Our kitchenette gives us a chance to return our diet to normal. It also gives us a way to prepare for the next day of adventure. This is the third year in a row we have stayed at the TownPlace Suites, It is a bargain compared to other suites in the area. The staff are always warm and friendly. Have a complimentary breakfast in the morning and you are ready for another day of adventure. Thank youTownPlace, you
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful 5 star review!  I hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: Very nice place I felt like I was staying in an apartment.  Stayed there one night. The pull out sofa bed was very uncomfortable but overall the breakfast was decent and hotel was fine there are plenty of places to eat nearby as well
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review.  I look forward in welcoming you and your family back on your next visit to Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: It was a Joy to stay at this hotel
Summary: If you want location, this is the place to stay. It was a Joy walking one block to the stadium, past many good eating establishments. We were back at our room before most people were out of the stadium parking lots. We went to Disneyland. We paid $5 for an ART all day pass. It was a Joy walking a block to the bus stop and being left off at the park entrance. Could not have been more convenient. But the real reason to stay at this hotel is the staff.  It was a Joy dealing with each of them. They were helpful, knowledgeable, and always smiling.  No matter what we needed, they were able to take care of it. They all went so far above and beyond, special requests were a Joy.   And I want to end this with a special thank you to Joy, one of the fabulous front desk staff. She handled
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your amazing five star review as well as your wonderful comments towards Joy.  You are absolutely right, she is a "Joy" to work with.  I will be sure to pass along your great comments to her and the rest of the team.  Thank you again and hope to see you back on your next Disneyland Adventure!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: This trip was a gift to me from my daughter, who recently graduated from college. She only began her career a few short months ago, and I didn't want to break her bank so I researched affordable places to stay in the Los Angeles or Anaheim areas.  After reading the reviews on Trip Advisor, we booked a 5 night stay.  We arrived on August 4th and was greeted by very friendly customer service reps.  By the end of the stay, I felt like they were old friends.  The room had a full kitchen and was very clean.  The hotel is conveniently located to Disneyland Parks, Angel Stadium and freeways.  The free breakfast was an added plus.  Great family value.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  I am glad to see that our team was able to take care of you during your vacation.   I hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: I booked this hotel while my bf and I were visiting the Disneyland parks. We stayed for a couple of nights and I was very pleased with our stay. The staff was really nice and helpful with anything we needed. We booked a studio and it was more than enough space for 2 people. The kitchen was really nice especially for people stay multiple nights and want to bring their own food. They have a stove, microwave and even a full size fridge. The offer a breakfast each morning with a variety of options from waffles to fresh fruit. The line for the waffles does get long so be patient because there is enough for everybody. They offer a shuttle to the park but since we were meeting up with other family at the park we just decided to carpool. There are places to eat around and the area is
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful 5 star review!  I am so glad to hear that your enjoyed your stay.    I do have good news, we just purchased a third waffle machine so we hope to cut the wait time for the waffles down!  See you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Hospitably  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Outstanding staff, short drive to Disney, and walking distance to Angels Stadium
Summary: Our family spent 8 days in a two bedroom suite in late July 2015. The rooms were spacious and accommodated two adults and two children. While we didn't cook in the kitchen, the ability to do so was very good and the refrigerator and freezer were a good size.The swimming pool was used quite a bit by the kids and the staff were quick to provide towels as needed. It was a favorite spot for the kids.  The front desk staff was amazing. They were very friendly, prompt to support us, and made you feel welcomed everytime you walked through the lobby.  Also very important, the beds were comfortable, which is needed after full days at the local amusement parks and entertainment. We would certainly recommend this hotel to anyone going to the Anaheim area as it was easy to get to
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your amazing review.  I look forward to your next visit to Anaheim to welcome you back to the TownePlace Suite.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Customer Service! Front Desk Receptionist Adilene was amazing throughout our entire stay!!
Summary: My stay was very last minute. I called two weeks before our stay and the front desk was very helpful in helping me find accommodations for me and my family. Although we did not spend much time at the hotel, the customer service was spectacular and loved the comfort of our rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your great 5 star review!  I am glad to hear that we were able to accommodate your needs during your stay.  I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Base for Disneyland, Angels, & Convention Center
Summary: We spent 3 days at this hotel, whilst at a convention at the Anaheim Convention Center and at Disneyland.  Although this is not the closest hotel property to either, it is the best as far as hospitality and professionalism go.  We arrived a bit before the posted check in and before too long, we were able to go to our room.  I have to say the visit to the Towneplace Suites, Anaheim was made exceptional by the staff that works there, notably Adilene at the front desk.  The smiling and professional service that she provided is what one would expect at a Ritz Carlton or St. Regis property.  Note to management:  You should hold on to and value employees like Adilene.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your 5 star review.  I am glad to hear that Adi and our team were able to give you 5 star service during your visit to Anaheim.  I hope to see you on our next Disneyland Adventure!   Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: I usually stay at 5 star hotels but I had to book this one last second when everything else was sold out. I stayed for 4 days. The room was a bit old and stuffy but everything was clean and on point.   The best part was the staff. The service that they have provided is equivalent of what I usually get at a 5 star hotel and maybe even better. Adilene was the girl who helped me out most of the time, she was great. Theresa also helped a lot for my girlfriend to arrange a great gift to be in my room once I got there!  Overall, a very pleasant surprise of an experience! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review as well as your kind words for the staff and Adi.  I will be sure to share your comments along to them.  Thank you again and I look forward in welcoming you back.    Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: I want to say some special words about Adilene. She is a true asset to your organization. She is always smiling, positive and up beat. She is very organized and helpful. I would expect special things from her. Your lucky to have someone of her magnitude working for you.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review as well as your great comments for Adi. She truly is a great asset and I will be sure to pass along your comments with her and the team.  I hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect for trip to see the Angels
Summary: Located within walking distance to Angel Stadium, sports bars, restraunts, etc. Always clean and friendly. Adilene at the desk always makes us feel special and meets our "special requests". Sales Manager, Aric always seen out and about talking to guests and listening to what they have to say. All staff seem so happy and always courteous to guests. Cant wait to go back!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review and your great comments towards Adilene and Aric.  I will be sure to pass along your comments with them.  I look forward in welcoming you back for your next Angel game!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Exceptional Service to Make You and Your Family Happy
Summary: We traveled to Anaheim to visit Disneyland for 3 days.  Upon arrival it was around 1:00PM - which is early for check-in.  We decided to wait in the lobby/dining area and were pleasantly surprised with an early check in after 15 minutes.  Then, we needed to go get milk for our 2-year old.  The Sales Manager, Aric McGhee, insisted on going down to the store to get a carton of milk so that we could rest from our travels.  The room was great for a Disney visit because you have a small kitchenette and full-sized fridge.  The free breakfast provided an array of options, both hot & cold, and we couldn't complain about a thing.  I know this is a glowing review, but its true.  You take a public shuttle (ART) to the parks, or even to a shopping center just down the road.  If you wanted to
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your great review! I am pleased to see that we were able to make your Disneyland vacation much more enjoyable.  I hope to see you on your next Disneyland Adventure!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: Let me start first by saying the management staff Aric/Manager and Teresa/Asst. Manager are very friendly, courteous and extremely helpful.  As a surprise for my daughters' 6th birthday I decided to take her to Knott's Berry Farm and I was looking for a suite for our family stay. As we were travelling by car and would make it to the hotel much earlier than the normal check-in time of 4pm, I requested an early check-in.  When I arrived in the LAX area, I called to see if a room was available and the customer service agent advised that did have a room they were able to accommodate.  I headed over the hotel, checked in and headed to my room.  I had only booked a studio suite and upon entering the room I saw that this would be pretty tight for us and wanted to upgrade to another
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your amazing review!  I am so glad to hear that we were able to make your daughter's birthday that much more special.  I have gone a head and shared your wonderful comments with the staff.  Thank you again and I hope to see you on your next trip to Anaheim!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Price. Close to Disneyland. Older finishes
Summary: This hotel was in a great location for Disneyland and is often a great price.  We like it for the two bedroom/two bath units.  Those are often less than two separate rooms so we'll split it with family or friends.  The hotel is older so the carpet, walls, and other finishes aren't as nice as some of the brand new hotels.  For half the price though it has been worth it to us; and when we stay here we are going for a Disney trip so we're not in the room much anyway.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your review.  I see that your review states this stay was back in August of 2014.  I hope that we will be able to invite you back to the TownePlace Suites to see the on going changes we continue to make to ensure a more beautiful product.  I look forward to seein you on your next Disneyland Adventure!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: We had a party of 6 and the staff was great!! Very nice Hotel, Clean rooms, and my children were even able to swim in a nice clean pool that is always very important. Other Hotels should take training tips from their staff on customer service, very attentive, smiling, and just great personalities. Thank you so much Jilian, Adilene and Chris for making our stay so pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your great review as well as your wonderful comments for our front desk team.  I look forward in welcoming youback to the TownePlace Suites on your next visit to Anaheim!  hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: We had reservations at this motel for over two months and prepaid. After driving 800 miles to begin our family Disneyland vacation we got a call saying our rooms had been cancelled. When I called the motel I was told this happens all the time and it wasn't their problem. I asked her what I was supposed to do with 16 people and no rooms. She didn't care.  On the advice of others we went to the motel anyway and demanded to see the manager. He was more sympathetic and found us rooms elsewhere for two nights and then got us in for three nights. His explanation was that the rooms were not clean but we know they double booked and just chose to cancel our reservation.
Manager Response: Dear Panic123,  Thank you for your review. I understand that you had booked and prepaid in advance; and I apologize that we were unable to honor your reservation for the first two nights. When we spoke in person I explained to you that, yes, our hotel was overbooked due to a group extending their stay; so I am sorry if there was a misunderstanding of rooms being cleaned. I will admit that I am caught off guard by your review as it does not fully explain the situation nor the very generous compensation you were given. We reached out to priceline who in turn reached out to you to offer alternate accommodations which you declined.  Upon arriving at out hotel, we profusely apologized and set you up with three penthouse suites at our sister property and covered a portion of the bill. Upon your return to our hotel we reduced your rate for the remainder of your stay. I truly apologize that your vacation started off on the wrong foot but I hope that the money saved in the end was used to enjoy your time at Disney!  Yours in Hospitality,  Edward

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, especially if you will be here a while or are traveling with family.
Summary: We had a 15 night stay and this was perfect. There was great restaurants nearby and the kitchenette is great to make things in your room and save on meals. The staff was very accomodating and supported any requests that we made. PArticularly when we needed an extra night and they were oversold. Aric was a gem constantly checking on how we were doing when he saw us on the property and assisting with some printing needs when the lobby printer was tied up and I needed to get some things mailed ASAP. I definately recommend this hotel if you are going to Disney or looking to attend an Angels game.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  I am so glad to hear that we were able to accommodate you and your family.  Hope to see you again on your next trip to Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: We, family of 3, arrived around noon on a Sunday just taking our chance to check in early. The hotel was booked the night before and I knew it might be 3pm before we get a room. But everyone behind the reception tried very hard to get us a room early. We were just hanging out in the reception area, watching TV and they gave us constant updates and eventually we got a room at 12:30pm. I was very impressed! The next morning my daughter and I arrived at the breakfast area at 9:30am, realizing that breakfast is just about to end. The young girl cleaning up the breakfast area was more than accommodating to make sure we have everything we need. She even wheeled the cereal bar out into the room for us again. That was so nice! EVERYONE was always saying "Hello, how are you", from
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your awesome review!  I am so glad to hear that our staff was warm and welcoming at every interaction.   I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites Anaheim on your next trip to Anaheim!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: AWESOME STAFF AND PET FRIENDLY PLACE!
Summary: We would like to Thank all the wonderful staff especially  Aric McGhee (Sale  Mgr) Teresa Mendoza (Housekeeping Mgr) They all went over and beyond to make sure that our long extended stay here with our pekingese K-9 a very comfortable and pleasant experience. Not only TownePlace Suites by Marriott Anaheim Miangate Near Angel Stadium rooms are very clean, comfortable, & pleasant they also accommodate you with all your personal needs but what made us very happy stay here is seeing how pet friendly they truly are and how our pet WillyBoy felt so much at home and loved by all that worked there. We will definitely recommend this place to all our friends and family❤️
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  It was a pleasure to have you, and of course WillyBoy, as our guests.  I look forward inwelcoming you back in the future.  hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location at a great price!!
Summary: I was a little timid to stay here from a couple of the photos I saw but since they were from a few years ago, I thought I'd give it a try. I am so glad I did stay here because the stay was amazing! The hotel was right next to Angels stadium and about a mile from Disney. The rooms look like they have just been remodeled as everything with so clean and spotless. Great hotel and I look forward in returning on my next Disney trip!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your great review!  I look forward in welcoming you back on your next Disneyland adventure!  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: What a great stay! Clean hotel, rooms, linens. Good breakfast too, the ladies at the breakfast were really nice. When we arrived in Santa Ana originally we had another hotel which was the most disgusting hotel I've ever been.... until we switched to TownePlace and had the pleasure to be greeted and checked in by Gary, he was quick and and very very kind. Our experience was GREAT and we will be staying there in the future again.
Manager Response: Dear valued Guest,  Thank you for your review and your amazing comments for Gary.  I am so glad that we were able to exceed your expectations.   I hope to see you on your next trip to Anaheim.  Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: I love this hotel! I went up with my boyfriend for an Angels game and this hotel is conveniently right up the road. The staff is super friendly and very accommodating.  The rooms are really nice, too and even have a little bit of that home-y feel. Seems like a popular place for extended stay (for business travel) and with all the amenities in the room I'd definitely recommend it. Not only that but they have a pool with a grill for when you have time to relax from your business endeavors or other fun plans in the OC area.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  I look forward in welcoming you back to the TownePlace Suites on your next Anaheim visit.   Hospitably,  Greg Williams General Manager

Summary: This wasn't as good as the other Marriott's I've stayed it in the past. Super small, bathroom was tiny! Room wasn't as clean as I would have expected from a Marriott won't stay here again. I usually never think twice about booking a Marriott I will from now on.
Manager Response: Dear Sanglin,  Thank you for taking time to share your most recent experience on TA! Our goal at TPSA is to ensure each guest feels that they are at their home away from home. We like for our guests to leave feeling like we WOWed you through your stay. I am truly sorry to learn that we did not meet your expectations. Your concerns have been addressed with the maintenance and housekeeping departments, and as a management team, we are looking to assure that each room exceeds the Marriott standards for cleanliness and upkeep. I truly hope next time you're in the Anaheim area you give us another chance and I will be sure to give your reservation my personal attention.  Yours in Hospitality

Summary: When I check into any hotel I expect clean washed sheets. We are booked into town place suites in Anaheim, I pulled back the sheets in the morning after sleeping on them and I was sick- their was blood spots on them. I went to the front desk to find out they supposedly change the sheets after someone checks out. Ah hello!! Someone was not doing their job! Ewe I am pissed and will not stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Suzy N,  Thank you for sharing your experience TA on your most recent visit to TPSA. I am sorry to learn that we did not meet your expectations. I am truly sorry to learn that there was a cleanliness issue during your stay. Your concerns have been shared with the Housekeeping team. Our goal is to provide each guest with the comforts of home accompanied with memorable moments. Once again, please accept our sincerest apologies for having fallen short of that. Should your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, I truly hope you will consider us; feel free to reach out to me and I will give your reservation my personal attention so that we can demonstrate the TPSA service that WOWs our guests daily.  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary: We will definitely make this our hotel of choice anytime we are in the Orange County area.  Check-in was super fast and effortless. The room was spacious, impeccably clean.  Small kitchen with everything a traveler could hope for.  Breakfast was included in the price.  We were here for a Bette Midler concert and, could not have picked a more perfect location.  We met the Sales manager Aric who was the kindest & most engaging hotel personnel person I have ever met. We left feeling like we had made a true friend with him.  Special thanks to Gary at the front desk when we returned from the concert. He greeted us, engaged us in conversation.. As did Aric, and even offered coffee and cookies as we sat and chatted about the concert.  Check out was super easy, as I did it on my phone
Manager Response: Dear DebDeb59,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience on TA! I'll be sure to pass along your kind words to both Aric and Gary! I'm delighted to read you found our suite to meet your needs; that's what we aim for! We always look forward to welcoming back old friends, so please come stay with us when you're back in Anaheim!  Yours in Hospitality,

Summary Heading: Another great stay at the friendliest hotel!
Summary: We have stayed at TownePlace Suites many times, and consider it our Kiwi home away from home. The apartments are big and roomy, and always well stocked and clean. The staff are exceptionally friendly and always willing to help. Greeting us by name makes you feel 'known'. This hotel is very well located, within a 5-10 minute drive to Disneyland...close enough to hear and see the fireworks display :-) Across the carpark are numerous places to eat, including Denny's, Fresca's, Starbucks, and Baskin Robbins. The free breakfasts provided each morning are just wonderful...you just help yourself, and can take back to your room if needed. We love coming to this place, and always recommend it to other Kiwis visiting Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear KiwiMidwife,  Thank you so much for your 5-star review!! We are thrilled to hear that you consider us your "home away from home" and that you were delighted once again with your stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Marriott. It is customer loyalty like YOURS that allow us to build a foundation on trust and we will never stop trying to exceed your expectations! We look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Warmest Regards

Summary: We stayed in TownePlace for 1 night.  Location wise, it is very close drive to Disneyland, so it's great.  I gotta admit, the rooms are bit outdated.  However, for the price you pay, it is a great deal.  The room we stayed in was a 2 bedroom unit, with a full kitchen.  The rooms are little small and the beds are queen size, but it would be perfect for families.  The continental breakfast was surprisingly good.  Nothing fancy, but a lot of choices.  Basically, this hotel is no frills hotel, built for extended stays for families on set budget.
Manager Response: Dear jojo0215,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent visit to the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott. We appreciate hearing your feedback about the room conditions and breakfast options, and are teaming up as a management team to tackle some of your concerns. We hope that if your travels bring you back to Anaheim, that we will be able to serve you again in the future!  Warmest Regards

Summary: We stayed here for one week. We had a queen bed and pull-out, and a kitchen (room 334). The bathroom is big with a clean tub for the littles. The room was clean and the kitchenette had everything we needed, including a stove! The service was great while we were there, and room service did a great job. The breakfast area is SUPPER small, but we were pleased and always left with full bellies to start our ventures. There is an outdoor mall called The Garden Walk just 3min up the road with a variety of restarants to choose from including Cheesecake Factory and Bubba Gump Shrip. It looked like the mall got really crowded Thursday-Sunday, but while we were there (Monday-Thursday) it was almost a ghost town which was really nice!! We were a little hesitant of the area, but when we
Manager Response: Dear Joel L.  Thank you so much for your perfect review! I am so glad to hear that you were able to immerse yourself in the community and really get to know the amenities offered at and around the hotel. Here at TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate, it is always our pleasure to ensure your satisfaction with your overall experience while visiting Orange County. Please feel free to reach out to me directly if your travels bring you back to the area.  Warmest Regards

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 5 weeks while undergoing treatment at St. Joseph's Hospital in Orange. I was so impressed with the service here, the girl at the front desk memorized my name on the first day and every request that I had was granted quickly, from needing towels to getting my dishwasher repaired. The staff was always smiling and that helped me a great deal, considering I was away from home, and was not feeling well. The hotel itself was clean and more of a 4 star, but I give it 5 for great service!
Manager Response: Hi Donna,  It was our pleasure being your "home away from home" while you were in Anaheim! Thank you so much for taking your time to write a review for us at TPSA, and I am so glad to hear that we made you feel welcomed and valued as a guest. We will truly miss your warm smile and sincerity, but hope to see you again in the future when you come to vacation in the Orange County. Please feel free to let me know if I can assist in any way!  Warmest Regards

Summary: Having spent most of my career travelling, I have found that customer service has become a lost art.  That is far from the case with the first class staff at the TownePlace Suites in Anaheim.  Joy, Anisa, Mari, Teresa and the team always go the extra mile to ensure my stay is incredibly is like home away from home.
Manager Response: Hi Mark T,  Thank you so much for the perfect review! It's guests like YOU that allow us to give that extra special touch in service excellence. I will definitely pass along your kind words to the team and I am sure that they will be pleased to hear that we have made the Towneplace Suites your ideal Home Away From Home!  Warmest Regards

Summary: Towne Place Suites is a great place to stay while visiting Anaheim.  Located across the road from Angel Stadium and somewhat near Disneyland.  Place was very clean and had a cute kitchenette with stove, microwave, dishwasher, and fridge.  Perfect for families that don't want to eat all their meals out.  A grab and go breakfast was included along with free WiFi and parking.
Manager Response: Hi gotkona,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott. I'm pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy the full kitchen and the close amenitites! We look forward to seeing you again in the future and feel free to reach out to me directly when you start making plans.  Warmest Regards

Summary: First we were not sure if we wanted this hotel or not but, when we called the staff was fantastic. We can't say enough about how Dani, Jillian and Joy and the breakfast staff made our stay better each day.  We had some issues in our room and Jillian contacted the maintenance man and got the problem resolved.  The room was a two bedroom which was not the largest but, it was better then a room with two beds.  We were comfortable with 4 kids and two adults. It was not far from Disney and other attractions. We stayed for three nights and we enjoyed everything. The only downside was breakfast area gets crowed.  We would stay again and recommend it as well.
Manager Response: Hi mtvick11,  Thank you for taking your time to write a little something about your experience while visiting the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate. Joy, Jillian and I are always pleased to assist you in any way and look forward to seeing you again in the future!  Warmest Regards

Summary: I just recently stayed at the Marriott on April 6th, 2015. (Town Place Suites) My reservation number 92259623.  I stayed at this hotel with my wife and 2 daughters for a family trip to Disneyland.  We are a Gold member and we love staying at the Marriott. This was the worse stay and I was disgusted that this hotel has the Marriott logo attached to it.   I have wasted my certificate at this hotel which makes it even worse.  The problems are as followed in room 323:  Mildew shower head, we did not even consider taking a shower or bath due to the green mildew around the shower head where the water comes out.  The kitchen faucet had small black ants crawling and a disgusting orange, gold crest around the base of the faucet. Also in the common area (family room) the fire sprinkler
Manager Response: Dear Pierre P.  Thank you for taking the time write a review and I am sorry we were unable to meet your needs or expectations while visiting us at TPSA. Your concerns have been addressed with the maintenance and houskeeping departments, and as a management team, we are looking to assure that each room exceeds the Marriott standards for cleanliness and upkeep. I am pleased to hear that we returned your certificate, so you can still enjoy a future stay at any of our Marriott properties. Please feel free to reach out to me directly if you have any further questions or concerns that we have not previously addressed.  Warmest Regards

Summary Heading: The 2 bedroom suite is great for a large family
Summary: We stayed here when we came to Anaheim to watch Angels games two nights in a row.  It was the perfect location.  It is across the street from the stadium and there are a few places to eat that range from Carls Jr to a nicer sit down restaurant (The Catch I think?).  The hotel provides a continental breakfast which was a pretty standard hotel breakfast.  It's always convenient when traveling with kids.  There was barely any room to sit and very busy.  One morning I ended up finding a table and the next morning I took our food out to the pool and sat out there with the kids which was very peaceful.  The pool area is small, but enough to keep the kids busy for a couple of hours.  It was a nice temperature, not too cold.  They also loved going between the pool and jacuzzi.  The room
Manager Response: Hello Snulie,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful review about your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott. It is candid reviews like yours, that allow us to continually look at ways to make guest's stay more comfortable and relaxing. I have mentioned your comments to the appropriate department managers, and we are brainstorming ways to review your areas of concern. We are delighted to serve you again, if your travel needs bring you back to the Orange County area. Thanks again!  Warmest Regards

Summary: So we stayed here for several days in a two bedroom suite. The rooms in the suite are very small and the beds are awful. I woke up every day with a sore back. One day after returning from a day out we crashed. In the morning we realized that the sheets we slept on had several old blood stains on them. I assure you they were not from us. At this price there are better places to stay in the area and we will definitely not be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Mike M.  I am so sorry to hear that your stay was not satisfactory while visiting the TownePlace Suites Anaheim. I have informed the appropriate department managers about your concerns and we are looking at ways to correct these issues in the future. However, I was glad to hear that my front desk team offered you Marriott Rewards points for the inconveniences you experienced. If you decide to give us another opportunity to better serve your needs, please feel free to reach out to me directly.   Warmest Regards

Summary: Overall a very well kept and modern hotel. I normally always stay within the Marriott family of hotels for a reason. Unfortunately this last minute trip and limited availability forced me to stay at another local "suites" hotel. Needless to say I cancelled the remaining days at the other hotel and was fortunate to be able to book my remaining 2 nights at the Towneplace suites and enjoy the remainder of my family Disney trip. I booked the 2 bedroom suite and couldn't have been happier with the setup and accommodations . Breakfast was basic with the hot and cold cereal, waffle maker and assortment of pastries and breads but don't expect IHOP but it met our needs. The staff was extremely polite and helpful and I would definitely stay here again on my return trips to the area.
Manager Response: Dear jbmontez,  I am so delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Marriott! It is always our pleasure to serve you and your family when your travelling needs bring you to Orange County. We appreciate your candid review and look forward to seeing you in the future.  Warmest Regards

Summary: We arrived to a very clean, modern area of town.  Across the parking lot was several food locations.  The parking lot is large and well lit, the staff at check in was very friendly and gave us the directions we were looking for.  We checked in, relaxed for a few minutes and decided to take a walk.  A very nice area of town.  Our room was very clean, it has a microwave, stove, dishwasher, refrigerator and dishes and utensils.  The queen size bed was very comfortable.  The continental breakfast was good and plenty of fresh fruit.  The walk to the arena was about ten minutes.
Manager Response: Dear Marc W,  Thank you so much for taking your time to review your recent stay at TownePlace Suites Anaheim Marriott. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the local area attractions that surround the property. Your 5-star review is so encouraging for the team here at TPSA and we would be delighted to serve you again in the future. If your travels bring you back to the area, please feel free to contact me!  Warmest Regards

Summary: I just spent a week with my family here doing the So Cal amusement park rounds.  I cannot say enough good things about the staff.  When we arrived our rooms were not adjoining.  The gal at the front desk named Dani rearranged the rooms so that we could have adjoining rooms and then because one of them was not yet cleaned from the last guest she called housekeeping and got it cleaned immediately.  Every little thing that we needed she took care of.    The breakfast attendant named Daniella was amazing with my children.  She greeted them all by name each morning.  She would compliment them and make them feel special.  I swear she cleaned up at least one glass of spilled milk every day!  Each day the housekeepers made my little girls beds in a new fun way.  They would fold their
Manager Response: Hi Chad!  Thank you for taking your time to write such an amazing review about your experience at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim! Your perfect score reaffirms our drive to make sure that each and every guest leaves satisfied and valued. We can't wait to serve you again in the future! When your lodging needs bring you back to Orange County, please feel free to contact me directly!  Warmest Regards

Summary: I too had read some pretty disturbing reviews about this hotel, but I needed to be close to Angel Stadium for a 10 game home stand, so I booked it.  I LOVED THIS HOTEL. So much, that I am returning for another 10 game home stand in May.  From first check in to check out, the staff were fantastic. I arrived early morning from Australia, so I was exhausted. However I got checked in.  I had a ground floor room which was awesome. I loved the kitchen and the shower (temp and water pressure) was excellent.  It was very hot weather and the air conditioner worked a treat. (I had to get one of the staff to check it as it had a loose plug).  Only hiccup I had was after one week there, the housekeeping staff emptied out the stuff I had in the fridge as they thought I had checked out. Lol.
Manager Response: Hello Denise,  Thank you for taking the time to write your review of your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott. I am so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you again in MAY! If you need anything to make your stay more comfortable, please feel free to reach out to me.  Warmest Regards.

Summary: Booked 2 studio rooms for the weekend of the namm trade show at the anaheim convention center and the experience I had was overall great. The rooms were comfortable, the complementary breakfast was scrumptious and the staff was very helpful and kind. I would definetley recommend this hotel resort to anyone that's looking for a great place to stay. The person that assisted us went the extra mile for our experience and her name is Joy so kudos to her!!!
Manager Response: Dear Vlara07,  Thank you for the 5 star review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott. I'm excited to read that you would join us again in the future and we look forward to seeing you soon! Please feel free to reach out to me directly when your lodging needs bring you back to Orange County.  Warmest Regards

Summary Heading: My favorite little secret in Anaheim
Summary: It's not fanciest.  Nicest.  Not closest.  But staff nice. Perfect for people who want some space.  Plenty places to eat close.  I have atleast 100 nights here over last 7 years.   Love having kitchen.  It is getting a little dated in kitchen are.  But still solid
Manager Response: Dear AngryBirdMSP,  Thank you for taking your time to write a review for the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Marriott! It is truly guests like YOU that allow us to strive for excellence each and every day. Your loyalty and devotion to our property is much appreciated and we are always delighted to have you stay with us. Please feel free to reach out to me when you are returning as I would love to thank you personally!  Warmest Regards~

Summary: Stayed here and walked 0.9 miles to the Honda Center to watch the Anaheim Ducks' hockey play. 8 people went and we got 2 suites. EACH suite has 2 distinct bedrooms. The "master" bedroom has a queen bed, tv, dresser, closet, desk & chair, and a heating/ac unit. The other bedroom does not have a dresser nor desk/chair-but does have the rest.  The "living room" has a sofa bed. Like any sofa bed, it is not great- you can feel the springs. But the 11 year old loved the idea of having his own bed with his own tv AND his own ac/heating unit.   The kitchen is fully stocked with things you might need: plates, pans, utensils, cups, etc... It has a decent size frig & freezer, stove, oven, microwave & dishwasher. We were only there 1 night so did not utilize the kitchen.  The towels in the
Manager Response: Dear Shannon W.  Thank you so much for your thoughtful and candid review of your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott! We are ecstatic to hear that you will return when coming back to visit the Orange County area. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to serving you again in the future!  Warmest Regards~

Summary Heading: Christmas Holiday Vacation is S Calfornia
Summary: Excellent facility, friendly hotel staff, reasonable rate and a lot of parking space.We will sure be back in this hotel. Another good thing is that the hotel premises is secured, and hotel staff are so helpful.
Manager Response: Hello Eddie66_12,  Thank you for taking the time to write a 5-star review for your stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott. I have passed along your kind words to the staff and they were thrilled that you enjoyed your time with us. We can't wait for you to return and we are looking forward to serving you again in the future!  Warmest Regards,  Danielle Johnson

Summary: We had such a great experience with this hotel! The staff is wonderful and always very nice! They would always help clear your breakfast, deliver items to your room if needed and were super friendly to my children. The breakfast was nice and always full of items. The rooms were cozy and it was very quiet all the time. Very close to Disneyland. Took us just a couple minutes to drive there. Nice area around too. Close to grocery store.  Would recommend this hotel to anyone planning a trip!
Manager Response: Hi Summer,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We are delighted to hear that you had such a great stay and that our staff was able to really shine. It is loyal guests like YOU that help us elevate our level of service every day. We look forward to serving you again in the future!  Warmest Regards,  Danielle Johnson

Summary: The staff,from the late night auditor to receptionist to cleaning crew everyone is so friendly and helpful and professional.   He hotel is 4minutes from hotel parking to Disneyland parking. (Also 3 blocks from Angels stadium) Morning breakfast is a great treat and the property and rooms are updated and impeccable.  Room rates are very affordable and lots of dining options open till late in the hot and around. Not to forget, They Are PET FRIENDlY.  ;-) 🐶
Manager Response: Dear dcuf33,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a wonderful, 5 star review about the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott! I'm so glad to hear that you received exceptional customer service, enjoyed the breakfast options, and that you were able to utilize our pet-friendly facilities.  Warmest wishes this holiday season and we look forward to serving you again in the future.  Sincerely, Adam Sahagun

Summary Heading: Average at best, this location shows its wear & tear
Summary: Clearly this is a popular hotel. One look at the lobby area, the common areas, and your room will tell you this hotel gets lots and lots of use. It looks like it needs some TLC and a face lift.   Nothing is dirty, just shabby. Nothing is worn to a fray, just run down.   The staff is friendly and efficient but not especially helpful. The furnishings in the room were probably highly functional when installed but now really show their age and overuse. The sofa in my room was stained in many places. The linens were gray from cleaning too many times, the bed a little lumpy from too many nights use without replacement.  Not a bad hotel, just not a great hotel either.
Manager Response: Dear GoldenBear_Husker,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott. We appreciate your candid review of the amenities and services offered at our hotel and we hope to turn your "average" experience into a superb visit the next time you are in the Orange County area. We apologize for not meetig your expectations on this last stay, but rest assured that we take all of your comments into consideration when looking for ways to improve on the quality and features offered at our hotel. Please feel free to contact me personally when you are in the area again, as I would be happy to assist in any way possible.   Warmest Regards, Adam Sahagun

Summary: I want to say this place is awesome. I am an educator (so I make MILLIONS..2.5 a year to be exact. LOL) and this was my 13 yr son's first time in California.  This was a surprise trip for him the week of Thanksgiving.  He is a hard worker in school and just a great kid and this was his reward after 4 years of earning this trip.  I was at first concerned after I made the reservations.  I read what people said on TripAdvisor.  I was concerned about the location, cleanliness, the staff, etc. I will admit I almost canceled the reservations to go to the Holiday Inn.  I AM SO GLAD I DID NOT. This place was great.  From the time we arrived until the time we checked out.  The suites are great.  We stayed in a suited. The couch pulls out to a bed.  My son slept on that.  They provided
Manager Response: Dear Yolanda A.  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write such a thoughtful review about the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott. We appreciate the kind words and are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We know that it can be hard when trying to reserve a hotel when there are mixed reviews, and we applaud you for giving us the opportunity to WOW you!   From housekeeping to customer service at the hotel, we pride ourselves on being able to accommodate your needs. I'm happy to hear your son enjoyed his first trip to California and I'm glad we could be a part of that experience for you and him alike. Thank you for your loyalty to the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Marriott and we look forward to serving you again in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Adam Sahagun

Summary: Hotel is in two buildings one of which parallels the road and there is a railroad track behind both properties.  However, with the windows closed you really don't hear anything.  The room is more of a studio than a suite but fine for one or two.  Looked at their two room suites and downside is only one bathroom but living area is spacious.  Nicely sized and equipped kitchen.  Breakfast area is a bit small in the morning but easy enough to take things back to the room and plenty of space there.  Front desk people and breakfast room staff were very helpful and pleasant.  There is a shuttle to Disney but I did not use it.  The free parking is unusual for hotels in the area and appreciated.  There are several restaurants and a Starbucks within easy walking distance which is handy.
Manager Response: Dear MOBX,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate. I am glad that we were able to provide you with great customer service and that you reveled in the free parking and close restaurants. We appreciate your candid feedback and hope to see you again in the future!  Warmest Regards, Adam Sahagun

Summary Heading: Great option for families or groups
Summary: I love that this hotel offers more than the traditional hotel room.  I have always stayed in a two room unit with a kitchen. This is great for kids, a girls weekend, etc.  The hotel staff has always been friendly and helpful. I have utilized the shuttle service too which is slower than a taxi but cheaper.  Hotel is walking distance from restaurants. Good for Disneyland Travelers
Manager Response: Dear TravelingJana,  Thank you for the 5-star review about your recent visit to the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott! We are so happy to hear that you were able to enjoy our unique room layouts, dine at the nearby restaurants, and utilize the ART shuttle service to Disneyland. We value your feedback and look forward to serving you again on your future vacations to the Orange County area.  Warmest Regards, Adam Sahagun

Summary: The customer service here is amazing and the maid service was five stars. It was clean and comfortable, was it great? not spectacular but nice. I agree with other reviews that the furniture is a little run down, curtains were a little worn. It is not what you would expect from a Marriot, that being said I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear suzeego,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out the Marriott survey for your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate. We appreciate the kind words about the staff and the recognition of the customer service provided.  We have noted your concerns with the overall quality of the furniture in the room, and have addressed these issues with the appropriate departments. It’s the valued feedback like yours that help us upgrade our overall service! Please feel free to contact me at your earliest convenience if you have any questions or concerns with this past visit or ones for the future.  Warmest Regards, Adam Sahagun

Summary: This hotel has a lot going for it in terms of location.  It is right across the street to the entrance to Angels Stadium.  So you could definitely park there and go to a game - great for out of town sports fans.  It is also close to the Honda Center - you could walk it but it's a high traffic area so might be safer to drive.  It is close to both the 57 and the 5 - so great location for business travel in the area.  For workouts they have a small gym - there was a health club next door but it closed so you need to go elsewhere for serious workouts including indoor lap swimming.  They do have a nice heated outdoor pool and spa that gets a lot of use by guests. As rooms go, the studios have a lot of room if traveling alone on business with decent WiFi.  If you need more space, get
Manager Response: Dear Greg M,  Thank you for your informative review about your stay with us at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Marriott. With a mission to provide superior customer service, we take great pride in serving your needs and are delighted to hear that we have met your expectations! Please feel free to contact me in the future if you have any lodging needs while in Orange County.   Warmest Regards, Adam Sahagun

Summary Heading: They ain't make it like they used to be
Summary: We have been back staying there almost 10 times since year 2000. Warm and friendly especially when Rachel was the hotel manager. Lately, there has been many change of management.....Emails not answered, rate quoted cannot be honored etc. Our room was not cleaned on the 2nd last day (after close to 3 weeks of staying and paid promptly weekly).  I has suspected bed bug bite. Danielle, the front office manager claimed that she would look into it but has been silence since.
Manager Response: Dear PCM0928,  Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback from you recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim. It is loyal guests like you that allow us to strive each and every day to raise our level of service and expectations. I am so sorry that you had less then a wonderful stay your last visit with us.  As you mentioned, we have recently gone through some management changes and hope that you lend us your patience in this time of transition. With that being said, I'm sorry that we haven't been able to honor previous rates or that you feel like your recent concerns haven't been heard. We take any cleanliness issue very seriously and try to always follow up with our guests. All appropriate departments have been informed of your situation and are being handled accordingly to further avoid in the future. Please feel free to contact me directly  when booking your next stay, as I would be happy to help in any way.   Warmest Regards, Adam

Summary Heading: Staying here is a wise decision
Summary: You will get good value for your dollar.  The location is excellent for multiple venues.  Angel Stadium and Disneyland are just two that are very close.  The breakfast offered a wide variety of food choices.  I have stayed at other TownePlace properties & this property offered the best breakfast of all.   There were both hot & cold items and my favoirite, waffles.   The only thing better than the breakfast was the staff.  Annissa greeted us and Claudia was there during the morning hours.  Both of these young women were professional, knowledgeable & enjoyed their jobs.  We felt welcomed & appreciated.    Our suite was roomy for 3 persons.  The table & office chair in the master BR made it convenient to work while others watched TV.  This allowed each of us to be undisturbed by
Manager Response: Dear mah-travelcoach,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out the Marriott survey for your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate and giving us a PERFECT score! We appreciate the kind words about the front desk agents, and we are happy to hear that you will be returning to the property in the future. It is loyalty like yours that allows us to deliver the impeccable customer service that you deserve.  Warmest Regards, Adam Sahagun

Summary: We went to this location to visit our grand daughter on her birthday.  She's a Sophomore at a local University.  This Hotel has two separate  buildings on the same lot.   Our room was (in the building with no check-in counter) on the third of four floors.  As we entered the first floor hallway to reach the elevator we were engulfed by an horrific stench.  The elevator was just as bad.  It was explained to us that folks that use this hotel for extended stays are allowed to cook in their rooms.  The so called suite we stayed in was just a bedroom with a small kitchenette.  These kitchenettes have no ventilation, so if fish, or other suave food is cooked the "aroma" gets into the walls, the carpeting, bedding, Ect.  In other words, it's like sleeping within the aroma of an empty
Manager Response: Hello dominic C,  Thank you for taking the time to complete a review in regards to your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate Near Angel Stadium.    As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. Please accept our sincere apology for your dissatisfaction with the breakfast space, the smells in the hallways and the lack of direction with our amenities offered by our staff at the time of your check in. We strive to create a wonderful experience for each guest by accommodating all requests and I am sorry that we fell short on your recent visit with us. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate hotel team to ensure that this was an isolated issue that is corrected moving forward.    We hope to regain your trust and loyalty on your future visits to Anaheim. Please feel free to contact me directly if you are visiting the Orange County area again in the future, as I will personally try and help make your stay as enjoyable as possible.  -Adam

Summary Heading: Pretty good place - would stay again
Summary: We stayed here for a trip to Disneyland. The good: 1 bedroom suite was very large.  The bedroom area was small but the living area was huge. Great working/desk area and very nice kitchenette with a nearly full sized refrigerator, small stove, microwave, etc.  Some things were recently renovated and looked very nice.  The staff was great, helpful and friendly.  Location was great, lots of stuff nearby, on the ART route to Disney and close to freeways. Breakfast was small but a decent selection - the waffles were really good and they had trays so that you could take food back to your room.  The bad: some parts of the hotel have not been renovated, so there is a mix of new/nice and old/run down in the same room (i.e bathroom counters were nice, but the rest of the bathroom was
Manager Response: Martha C.  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the TownePlace Suites Anaheim Maingate. We appreciate your kind words regarding your satisfaction with the friendly staff, amenities in the room, and overall location of the hotel. We pride ourselves on being able to provide you with a wonderful experience and we are happy to hear that you would return to the property on your future visits to Orange County.  I apologize that you experienced a few issues during your stay, but am glad to see that we were able to resolve those during the few days you were visiting with us.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to WOW you in the future and please feel free to contact me directly if you have any further questions or concerns.  -Adam

Summary: Business brings us to Anaheim at regular intervals. Towne Place Suites has become our home away from home. The recent renovation has really brightened things up. Situated between I-5 and Highway 57, it is very convenient to various stops in Orange County.
